name: Japanese Rural Life Adventure
description: Experience countryside living in Japanese Rural Life Adventure. "View the cherry blossoms in the spring, attend the festival in the summer, eat roasted sweet potatoes in the fall, hear the temple bell ring in winter, and then it's time for the first shrine visit of the New Year."

name: Space Bunny
description: A playable music video featuring Hatsune Miku. First in the series.

name: Dracula's Castle
description: Dracula's Castle is an aftermarket action game for the Sega Game Gear and Sega Mega Drive.

name: Life on Mars: Genesis
description: Life on Mars: Genesis is an aftermarket Sega Genesis game.

name: Chernobyl Again
description: Chernobyl Again is an adventure game adjusted for Virtual Reality headsets for a more immersive and engaging experience level. The story full of challenges and turbulence will let the players transform into a character trying to save the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant.

name: Tower Pets
description: Build the perfect team and compete with other players to win the tournament!

name: Froggies at the Zoo
description: Dive into a whimsical world of hopping fun and ribbiting excitement in Froggies at the Zoo! Join our charming amphibian friends on a delightful adventure that will have you leaping with joy.

name: Farming Simulator 22: OXBO Pack
description: Upgrade your fleet of machinery and enjoy specialty harvesting and application technology by the internationally renowned manufacturer Oxbo.

name: Shadows of Revenge
description: Shadows of Revenge puts you into the sinister heart of a mafia-dominated Manhattan. As the boss of a once-proud family now fallen into disgrace, your journey to reclaim the city will test your wit, resourcefulness and determination.

name: Little Mages
description: Defend your castle from various hordes of enemies that seek to invade it! Little Mages is a casual pixel art game with roguelite elements where you accumulate knowledge and learn powerful spells of your choice to defeat all your enemies.

name: Armored Souls
description: Armored Souls is a 2D Soulslike Action game with Roguelike elements and challenging boss fights set in a machine-driven dystopia. Navigate a beautifully desolate world, scrap enemies for parts and return to your foundry to assemble a variety of game-changing skills, programs and mechanical upgrades.

name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers: The Avengers Adventurer Character Pack
description: This pack for LEGO Marvel's Avengers includes 3 new characters: Space Captain America, Scuba Captain America, and Hyperion.

name: Zombies, Aliens and Guns
description: Earth’s last hope against an invasion is a band of military rebels Zombies! Aliens! Guns! Enough said.

name: Adventurer Farmer: Save my Son!
description: Use the dynamics of movement with the rope to take the character to the rescue of his son, who accidentally fell out of the plane, while traveling from the farm to the city. Take advantage of the boosts provided by the physics on the map and stay away from dangerous obstacles. Save the farmer's son!

name: Blitz Runner
description: In Blitz Runner, you'll dash through colorful landscapes, collecting dazzling gems that not only increase your score but also your speed! The more gems you collect, the faster you run, making every game a unique and exhilarating journey.

name: Evil Diary
description: Evil diary is a shooting game where you control the character Eve with a mission to escape the city to survive in this apocalyptic world.

name: The Bearer & The Last Flame
description: The Bearer & The Last Flame is a dark fantasy action adventure. In a realm where death is rampant, a living soul has received his commission, to carry the last flame and light the lands of the night, the dark lands.

name: Creature Evolution Simulator
description: Design an ecosystem and watch your creatures evolve through millions of years by means of natural selection. See them fight for survival and produce offspring which share their genes… occasionally mutating to form monstrosities! What will your creature’s final-stage of evolution be?

name: Pedro of Brazil
description: Delve into the epic saga of the Brazilian Empire in "Pedro of Brazil". Master gunfights, swordplay, and hand-to-hand combat. Play as historic figures and immerse yourself in events like the Brazilian Independence and the Paraguayan War. Relive the glory and challenges of an era!

name: A Nutritious Boyfriend
description: Amazing! You have just started a new position as a professional trainer at the prestigious Squirrel Fitness Club, a club for dedicated squirrels! Motivate and coach squirrel members until you stumble upon love with fun obstacles along the way.

name: Mononeko
description: In Mononeko, you weave attacks into the music, chain together movements and race against time to capture the kitten killers who are hiding a dark truth. It’s a quest for justice, set to the beat of your bravery.

name: Zen Fisher
description: Chill out, unwind and embark on a journey in Zen Fisher to collect all unique fish species and rarities in this vast, stylized 3D open world fishing game. Do you have what it takes to unlock the deepest secrets of the world?

name: Cat City
description: Step into the shoes of a mayor of a growing cat town! Talk to your residents, discover their life stories, help them with their daily tasks and complete quests to improve your city.

name: Soul Drifter
description: Soar into a gravity-defying parkour adventure. Run, jump, and glide through surreal landscapes and deadly factories on a mission to liberate captive souls.

name: Warcana
description: Warcana is a fantasy inspired base defence, RTS game with a deck-building mechanic. Face hundreds of thousands of unrelenting monsters in a battle royale between 30 other mighty magicians. Build your deck. Prepare your defences. Summon your armies. Survive the onslaught. Be the last one standing.

name: Dear, Virginia
description: embark on an emotionally charged journey through a vast open-world landscape as you assume the role of an inspiring protagonist set during the American Civil War, the game transports players to a gritty and historically inspired world filled with rich storytelling and immersive gameplay.

name: Illuminary
description: You find yourself catapulted back in time to the beginning of existence, and into the darkness where everything began. The Universe is yet to be born from a glimmer of light. You are called to discover and co-create a new existence with the help of colours and sound.

name: Black Jackal
description: Pilot your way through the deadly remains of derelict spacecraft, solve their mysteries, and get out with everything that isn't nailed down.

name: Century of Anticipation
description: Locked away at home, time slows to a crawl, your only company is yourself. In this short adventure, your challenge might be the toughest of all: make time pass again!

name: Joint Recall
description: You’re locked in a building from a horror movie. There are monsters and puzzles around, resources are never enough and all the survivors are complete strangers. Will you help each other? Let's find out!

name: Breath of the Depth
description: The crew of Project Flounder is lost in a mysterious shipwreck, and only L survives. When he escapes the submarine, he finds himself in a mysterious and lost country. It was full of never-seen sights, ancient ruins and unknown artifacts, and it made him want to explore every corner, every secret.

name: Axembler
description: Axembler is a collection of single-level games developed in a single application.

name: Hooked
description: Escape the chaos of modern life in Rosewood, a quaint town nestled in the heart of nature. With nothing but a patch of land by the lake and a burning passion for fishing, are you ready to seize the opportunity and build a thriving business that rivals even the biggest city corporations?

name: Cosmos Cat
description: Combat endless waves of ships as Cosmos Cat in this space action rogue-lite! Compete or cooperate with friends in optional local multiplayer mode.

name: You've been ReMaid!
description: Run for your life as you try to survive the night while being stalked by a cute maid who is dead set on teaching you some manners. Uncover secrets, outsmart your enemies, and embrace the absurd. Will you make it through the night?

name: Neo Dance
description: Discover Neo Dance, the exciting 4-point music game! Immerse yourself in a dystopian cyberpunk world and face, to the rhythm of music, hundreds of robots in this unique experience. Are you ready for the rhythmic battle?

name: When Life Gives You Lemons
description: From hookups to deep connections, your heart's desires bloom in this romantic tale. Life may be messy, but love makes it extraordinary.

name: Dark Pages
description: Descend into the depths of the Blocker Library, a place where darkness and terror intertwine. Solve puzzles, confront unique and horrifying monsters, and uncover the chilling story of this establishment. Will you find a way out, or will you become another dark page in this twisted tale of horror?

name: Bunraku
description: Experience the ancient art of Bunraku theater in fast-paced puppet battles between up to 8 players. Dash through your opponents, master the art of parrying and use all kinds of jutsus and shinobi tools to perform the best ninja show.

name: Mecha Knights: Nightmare - Operation Ascalon Expansion
description: Echo Team will be sent on a dangerous mission deep behind enemy lines. Uncover a new chapter in the game's story, featuring seven missions and a new tier of advanced parts and weapons.

name: Gulf Echoes: Memories of the Past
description: Embark on a co-op puzzle journey rooted in the Arab gulf region. Grab a friend and unravel tales from the past. You and your partner must bridge time, sharing clues to unveil hidden truths. Solve intricate puzzles from the present to the past.

name: Samira's House
description: Uncover the dark secrets of Samira´s House! Explore a haunted house, solve puzzles, and confront ghosts. Can you escape in time?

name: Olho Spectral
description: An RPG game following the style of the nineties classics. Turn-based battles, 3D scenery and pixelated graphics. Two worlds in parallel dimension to be explored. Dungeons full of puzzles and sinister monsters to defeat.

name: T.A.L.E.S.
description: The princess of fairy tales has experienced it all, everything. Poisoned, imprisoned, cursed, insulted by her stepfamily... But that's all over now. The princess has laid her hands on an artifact to change the course of history, and it has repercussions on all the tales...

name: Auto Check Up Simulator
description: Auto Check Up Simulator is an immersive simulation game that offers realistic car inspection and driving experience. Earn money, buy and upgrade vehicles, manage the economy, and prove yourself in the world of automobiles!

name: Cute Farmer Life
description: Cute Farmer Life is a small indie farm game. Grow, craft and collect resources in a game designed to relax and enjoy the moment. Discover the secrets of the small town you have moved to.

name: The Signal
description: Venture into the unknown on an uncharted alien planet filled with wonder and peril. Explore and survive by leveraging your creativity to craft infrastructure, equipment, and vehicles of your own designs. Awaken the dormant secret of a one-of-a-kind planet in an expedition of 1 to 16 players.

name: Elemdian
description: RPG that combines exploration with magic combat. Unfurl your claws as a powerful werewolf warrior wielding the power of the Elegems! A journey to find the Elegems, unleash devastating spells, and unravel the mysteries of Morrok.

name: Nyana
description: Join Nyana on her quest to both shatter the chains that have shackled her people and rebuild their society back up from the brink of extinction. Nyana is a story rich metroidvania set in an oppressive, yet beautifully hand-drawn world.

name: Area93
description: A journey through Area 93, where a zombie apocalypse occurred.

name: Demon's Den
description: Demon's Den is an Arena-Shooter-Roguelite from a bird's viewpoint, where you aim to explore and conquer a den teeming with demons. Select from various upgrades that influence and alter the gameplay to create unique builds and survive until only you remain as the sole survivor.

name: The World's Hardest Game 3D Nostalgia 2
description: Easy to play, hard to finish. The World's Hardest Game 2, which you used to play on flash game sites, is now with you in 3D! The same 50 levels as in the original game are now here. Be patient, dodge enemies and reach to the end in this 3D Hard Platformer!

name: 100 Steps
description: 100 Steps is a roguelike tower crawler in a fantasy boardgame setting. In search of glory, you have accepted the gods’ devious challenge of climbing the Tower. Play your hand, adventurer. And watch your step.

name: Oni Hunters
description: Journey through Gironia's lands, where monsters roam and secrets await. Battle, fuse creatures, and decide your fate in the grand Monster Jubilee. Ready for the adventure?

name: Kitchen Quest
description: Become the best chef in the world! Cook more than 50 dishes in your own kitchen with everything a chef needs. And don't forget to make your restaurant nice enough before all the guests leave!

name: Roborne
description: Explore and escape the sci-fi robot factory, classified as NR Securities. Are you willing to unveil the secrets of this twisted and corrupted factory?

name: Let Them Fall
description: Let Them Fall is a dynamic puzzle-strategy game. Transport objects using conveyor belts to the target zone. With each level, the game gets tougher with diverse shapes, colors, and limited space on procedurally generated maps. Will you take up the challenge?

name: Topswap
description: Topswap: A high-octane, shape-shifting FPS.

name: Runner Fruit Jumping
description: 'Runner Fruit Jumping' is a cartoon style leisure game. The small animals controlled by the player rotate on the fruit. You need to jump the small animals from one fruit to another.

name: One More Hound!
description: Bit your top-scores in this wave-combat game!!

name: Octopus Island
description: 'Octopus Island' is a leisure type game with the theme of ocean elements. The game simulates a pinball machine. The player controls the left and right baffles to hit the marbles out, so as not to let the marbles fall into the middle hole.

name: Story of Mine Company
description: Hire miners and help them extract ore using different tools. Try to control the chaos of the workflow. Manage resources wisely to stay profitable. Trade in the market. Craft items. Improve your base.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Arctic Realms
description: Using the latest steam technology, the hardy inhabitants of the northern lands have found ingenious ways to survive and thrive in the frozen wastes. Travellers to the region must face snowstorms, avalanches and even greater perils.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: The Wild West
description: Life beyond the frontier can be a dangerous endeavour. The few brave sheriffs responsible for law and order are hard-pressed to keep track of the banditry and vice that runs rife in these territories.

name: King of Avalon
description: Summon your Dragon and be the King of Frost and Flame in Avalon!

name: Leafy Trails: Lost Soul
description: Explore a lush and mystical overgrown realm, where nature's magic thrives in every corner. Venture through dense forests, shimmering meadows, and hidden groves as you follow the path of a courageous fox on a mission to save their beloved village.

name: Charles Haunted Mansion
description: Charles Haunted Mansion is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of a mansion, haunted by the vengeful spirit of a woman who was murdered inside the mansion decades ago.

name: Echoes of Humanity
description: Immerse yourself in the unpredictable world of biopunk. Explore an organic island, abandoned cities, mushroom forests and toxic wastelands. Modify your character and build a powerful deck to fight back against the crazed mutants on the path to the truth

name: Plum Blossom Divination
description: This is a simulated divination game. Use "Plum Blossom Divination" to help customers divine, learn its contents, experience the fun of divination, and understand the charm of traditional Chinese culture~

name: Combat Kart
description: A casual yet thrilling kart racing game. Experience top-notch drifting, exhilarating nitro boosts, adorable characters, and unique combat skills. Supports local multiplayer for up to four players and Remote Play Together!Get the ultimate experience on the Steam Deck as well.

name: Cold Ground
description: Save the homeland of Dalina on an one-man army mission in this MSX-inspired action RPG.

name: Rabbit's Fall
description: It will be a journey from scratch where you'll need to tend to your farm with a lot of hard work while striving on a mission to reestablish the city's guild for gaining recognition and respect.

name: Fossil Diggers VR
description: Explore, solve puzzles, uncover fossils, build dinosaurs, and watch them come alive before your eyes.

name: Shadows Are Alive
description: Enter the ever-changing world of Shadows Are Alive! Team up, channel epic alter-egos, and outwit "The Shift" in a shape-shifting haunted mansion. Relentless suspense, vibrant visuals, and unmatched strategy. Can you escape the mansion before time runs out?

name: Project Perun
description: A sci-fi action-adventure game in VR.

name: Quadrilla
description: Quadrilla is about high scores, big combos and simple arcade fun. Dig out and re-arrange blocks, clear lines, carve a path!

name: GallowsHill
description: GallowsHill is a test of wit. A unique falling block puzzle, you command cells, aligning color and frame to trigger effects. Your goal? Erase the star and claim victory. GallowsHill is a battlefield for thinkers, a challenge of intellect. Are you ready to carve your path of victory?

name: Hunters: Uprising
description: Hunters: Uprising is a hardcore, tactical PvPvE first-person shooter. Track and kill dangerous alpha monsters in the infested zones around the world, kill nightmarish monsters and outwit other players - alone or in a group. Then rest in the safe zone, upgrade your base, hunt, fish and survive.

name: Repair Adventure
description: "An adventure to fix a 34 year old car"

name: School Labyrinth
description: School Labyrinth is a co-op horror survival game for max 4 players. You can join your friends and try to escape from the process-generated school maze.

name: Bearnard
description: "Bearnard" is a captivating single-player adventure game where you step into the furry paws of Bearnard, a valiant archer-bear on a mission to reclaim a legendary bow and protect his beloved forest from threats. This journey takes players through diverse biomes, including dense forests, dark mines, snowy mountains, abandoned castles, and mysterious dungeons, each presenting unique challenges and enemies. The game features a core turn-based battle system where strategic card use is essential for victory. Mastering tactical combat aspects, players will rely on archery as their primary weapon. Collecting and strategically deploying a variety of cards, ranging from common to legendary, is crucial. These cards offer powers like healing, defense, and enemy control, enabling powerful combos. As players explore, battle opponents, and uncover secrets, they'll enhance their archery skills, expand their deck, and unlock the full potential of Bearnard's quest. Engage in this rich, story-driven experience, where wit and strategy pave the path to victory.

name: A Song of Sunlight
description: An RPG set in a distant, lonely future. Follow Arem, a young man lured from his small island community to explore the desolate megastructure beneath it: “The Well.” With the simple goal of finding the exit, Arem will burden himself with something more terrible than he ever thought possible.

name: Boyfriend Exorcist
description: You were meant to exorcise the ghost, not flirt with him! Choose your soulmate from ghost enthusiasts – dead or alive – and unravel the conspiracy lurking beneath the haunting in this exorcist dating sim.

name: Only Multiplayer: Up!
description: Get set to defy gravity, leap like never before, and experience the exhilarating world of parkour in a whole new light! This isn’t just your ordinary parkour jump simulator - it’s a dynamic ONLINE MULTIPLAYER adventure that transforms your every move into a gravity-defying spectacle.

name: Laruaville 6
description: Use your Match 3 skills for seeking hidden treasures on an uninhabited island!

name: Backrooms: The Phobolore
description: Backrooms: The Phobolore is a cooperative multiplayer online horror game for 1-4 players. In this game you will take control of a character who woke up in an unknown place and does not remember anything, your task will be to pass the game levels trying to remember who you are...

name: Flaw
description: Find a way out of here and get back to earth in FLAW, a retro-FPS inspired by cult classics: Unreal, Quake 2, Half-Life and many others. You and the Flaming Dawn’s passengers were looking for a better life among the stars, you have yet found only despair and darkness.

name: JellyCod
description: Jellycod recaptures the core of classic shooters. Return to the simple days of playing first person shooters with your friends. Grab your bolt action rifle in 'rifles only' mode or compete in 5v5 Search and Destroy. Wishlist now!

name: SauceLore
description: Embark on a silly little adventure through the wonderful Kingdom of Daanco! Help Saucey and friends save the kingdom from evil in this Turn-Based Combat RPG!

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Character Training Pack: Konohamaru Sarutobi
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Konohamaru Sarutobi (BORUTO) as a master in this "Master Character Training Pack"!

name: Real Boxing: Steel Champions VR
description: Real Boxing: Steel Champions VR offers a casual VR experience where players get to battle others via fearsome robot boxers

name: Resourceful.World
description: Join Healthy's thrilling quest to rescue their sister Nova and save the endangered planet Nimbylon! Explore this 2.5D planet scroller, solving puzzles, harnessing energies, managing the atmosphere, and uncovering interplanetary secrets in an enchanting adventure.

name: Tradesman: Deal to Dealer
description: Shake in your cart, buy here, sell there, protect your goods, and help your family.

name: Parking World: Build & Manage
description: The hunt for the ultimate parking space will never be more fun than with Parking World. Create your parking garage and carefully manage its operations and staff, overcome dynamic events, use the latest technology, and get ready to discover what perfect parking really looks like. From festival lined grass and mud lots to VIP valet parking and the hustle and bustle of a multistoried airport parking garage, the quest for the ideal space is detailed and varied.

name: Miyu's Cursed Store
description: Step into the shoes of a young shopkeeper in this unique RPG sim. Thrive in commerce and battles, defining your legacy in the underworld.

name: Oni Station
description: Oni Station is a horror game with roguelike and arcade elements where you pilot a train to outrun the creature chasing you. Carefully plan which stations to stop, search for resources and, above all, how far can you survive?

name: V
description: A real-life VTuber in a game! A multi-ending romance simulation game developed by a group of individual Vtubers.

name: Subside
description: Subside is an immersive aquatic VR experience with multiple areas to explore and lifelike aquatic creatures to interact with. Crafted with unparalleled realism, it aims to replicate the nuances of real-life swimming and diving in shallow waters

name: Awesome Pea 3
description: Awesome Pea is a fast precision platformer where you must run&jump through a series of challenging stages

name: Sandbox World
description: Welcome to the Sandbox World! Here, you bring your ideas to life: create tanks, airplanes, ships, and anything else – with over 120 unique blocks at your disposal. Engage, defend, and showcase your masterpieces in exhilarating battles that await you!

name: Bruteforce: Survivors
description: Bruteforce: Survivors is a dark techno-fantasy top-down ARPG where players combat hordes of foes, exploring diverse biomes. Face intense challenges, risk losing treasures upon death, but emerge victorious to reap immense rewards.

name: Paver Simulator
description: Did you ever dream to become a paving artist? Perform tasks, during which the most important thing is creativity and precision. According to your design you lay different types of paving stones, so you earn money and raise the level of your reputation. Test your skills in the Paver Simulator

name: Fairy Land
description: "Fairy Land" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: Rooms
description: You have found yourself in unexplained circumstances in an endless building with no apparent way out. Traverse through 100 rooms filled with monsters and puzzles and uncover the secrets of this building.

name: Joy Life 2
description: In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.

name: Eve of the Storm
description: Eve Of Storm is a village building game where you draw card, expand island, building structures, and more.

name: Wildlands
description: Dive into a unique adventure that will put you against a world ruled by natural forces! Explore, craft, battle predators, tame animals, build homes, harvest crops & so much more. Gather your friends, grab a weapon, and head out to conquer the Wildlands!

name: Shakabula
description: A South African urban legend called the Shakabula traps you in your house, could it be connected to your problematic past? You will need to find a way out of this horrendous curse. Creepy FMV+2D Art Atmosphere. "Steer" 'n Click + Metroidvania navigation system. JRPG + Twin-Stick Bullet Hell battles

name: Balloon Chase Journey
description: A cute art style, 2D scroll casual action adventure game, you need to play animals flying in the air on a balloon, fight and trample the balloons of others to win. You will see diverse natural scenery, face unknown challenges, start a joyous adventure, bring back the balloon fight fun of childhood.

name: Angry Mother Earth
description: In "Angry Mother Earth", step into the shoes of Mother Earth and her alternate forms: Father Earth, Midgard, and Gaia. Each offers distinct abilities and introduces diverse strategies to the gameplay.

name: Autocraft
description: Autocraft is a game where you will be playing as a mighty Dwarf that can collect loot.. as well as enchant his shield with bonus gems found around.

name: Rush Commander
description: Rush Commander is a direct action strategy game with one simple order, MOVE!You take the role of a commander in the World War II theater, and you must ensure to survive. Move your company, improve it, and request reinforcements to win!

name: Fairy Trails: Battle for Ever After
description: Fairy tales have started to invade your kingdom and it's up to you and your trusty companions to take them down and survive. Fairy Tales is a fantastical game with rogue-lite elements where the choices you make can drastically affect gameplay.

name: Pixels
description: Pixels is the new way of pixel battles. Share your art to the world on a huge canvas.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Airships & Aviators
description: Only the bravest dare to take to the skies, borne aloft in experimental flying contraptions. More sensible folk look up in awe at the soaring machines, wondering which will be next to come crashing back down to earth...

name: Redemption: Wrath of Sin
description: Immerse yourself in a chilling world of Horror. Solving intricate puzzles. Experience heart-pounding moments, where you must rely on your wits to survive. Collect clues to unravel the dark secrets hidden within. Use the intuitive inventory system to manage your resources, to survive this nightmare.

name: Resurrection Island: Love and Victory
description: The game is a turn-based bullet hell RPG, where a knight with amnesia arrives on a mysterious island and embarks on an adventure to find a way to leave.

name: Degraman: Act II - Victor
description: An otome visual novel with the main character trapped in a new, cruel reality. A lot of choices, unpredictably and cruelly affecting the outcome.

name: Hentai Maya
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Infinite Country
description: Weird Q-bomb RPG, bloody and realistic and realistic, Built-in homemade drama editor, 2D horizontal backroom stage play...

name: Ritual: Path of Darkness
description: Ritual is a tower defense that deals with a sorcerer who must draw runes to invoke a goddess of death. During the summoning, villagers and believers will try to overthrow you. To achieve your goal, you must acquire improvements that enhance your rituals, or the defense of your fortress.

name: Milfy City: Final Edition
description: Milfy City is an erotic adult game. Play as a college student trying to navigate his way through a city filled with hot women! Meet a cast of seductive ladies, enjoy erotic animations, and discover sexy secrets and hidden collectibles!

name: Anachronic
description: Anachronic is a single-player 2D puzzle platformer where physics is exploited through time manipulation.

name: Noblesse Oblige: Legacy of the Sorcerer Kings
description: Noblesse Oblige: Legacy of the Sorcerer Kings is a high fantasy RPG that reenvisions turn-based combat in dynamic ways, telling the story of Alexander—an idealistic yet pragmatic nobleman—and his allies as they navigate politics, intrigue, ruling, and love amidst a tempestuous civil war.

name: Save the Dungeon!
description: Save the Dungeon! Is a tower defense game from the perspective of the villain. Upgrade your minions to hold back the relentless hordes of heroes.

name: RegicideX
description: RegicideX is a 3D Hack'n Slash that takes place in a dark fantasy world plagued with rotten and evil angels and possesed people who have invaded the castle of our Lord. You will have to fight in order to liberate your castle and overcome the invasion.

name: Life in Middle East
description: "Life in Middle East" is a choice-based adult visual novel where your decisions dictate the outcome, exploring intense romances, societal taboos, and desires, while navigating through a captivating Middle Eastern setting.

name: Listen
description: There is no interface, it's all sound. The biggest feature of "Listen" is that there is no screen display throughout the process, and everything is entered by the keyboard and mouse movement.

name: The Hero gives up!... Wait, What!?
description: Adult-Only Fantasy Visual Novel featuring 5 girls, plenty of choices, comedy, and sex in a laid-back story!

name: Requiem Memory
description: Caution: This game contains high levels of violence There are a lot of bloodstains and violent directions

name: Aeolus Fighter 3
description: "Aeolus Fighter 3" is a vertical scroll flight shooting game. Players control the protagonist's fighter plane to fight enemies in the universe.

name: Real Drift Multiplayer 2
description: Real Drift Multiplayer 2 offers a unique experience waiting for drift enthusiasts! Experience a real racing simulator with customizable vehicles, competitive online modes, and realistic drift dynamics.

name: Perfect Landing
description: Rocket towards victory in Perfect Landing, a 2D minimalist speedrun racer. Dodge obstacles, dominate leaderboards, and create your own physics-based levels for an electrifying challenge!

name: Fractured Alliance
description: Classic real time strategy! Command varied forces, gather resources, build your base, adapt tactics, and dominate vast landscapes. Script your legacy in rich campaigns and dynamic multiplayer battles. Shape the destiny of the world!

name: Descended
description: A deep sea adventure for 1-6 players set far from the surface in an alien sea. Fight, befriend, and study your environment to unlock specialised mutations and tailor ecosystems in which you thrive. Spread Light beneath the Twilight Zone!

name: Astral Quester
description: Astral Quester is an Team RPG where you will play the role of an interstellar explorer to recruit, train, and fight. Embark on adventures with the Astrals — young girls. With multiple unique characters to recruit, animations, and a talented voice acting cast bringing them to life.

name: My Neighbour Mr.Ghost
description: Exploratory action-adventure game. Shoot the ghosts in the trapped school and escape! Can you escape from mysterious events?

name: Road Motorcycle
description: Road Motorcycle is a motorcycle racing game. The game uses realistic 3D pictures to simulate real roads.

name: Speechbound: A language RPG
description: Unleash your linguistic prowess with Speechbound: a multi platform RPG where the thrill of gaming and the power of education converge. Engage in a captivating narrative, battle formidable foes, tackle exciting language exercises, and discover the beauty of Babyl Moon.

name: Combat Zone
description: Welcome to the exciting world of Combat Zone! Get ready for an intense first-person shooting experience like never before.

name: Azure Striker Gunvolt 3: Ex Image Pulses - Nova and Desna pack
description: This pack adds 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt's "Nova," 4 skill-type Image Pulses of Azure Striker Gunvolt 2's "Desna," plus 3 additional passive-type Image Pulses, for a total of 11.

name: StickMan vs. MagicWorld
description: Stick man fight everyone in middle ages, using cold swords to fight against raging magic

name: Qiyun's World
description: This is an adventure game with a first person perspective. Qiyun is a device that allows users to enter the spiritual world of others So as to awaken the memory system of the amnesiac A series of interesting adventures occur in the process of attempting to awaken 127 memories .

name: True Abstraction: Plus
description: True Abstraction Plus - remaked predecessor of True Abstraction: Rewind with extended content.

name: Fruit Switch
description: Take part in an adventure where you shoot your sticky fruits through the air with a slingshot mechanism to rescue your kidnapped fruit friends. Discover the interesting and special abilities of all fruits while you fight the vegetables and complete their challenges

name: The Intruder
description: Uncover the chilling secrets of 'The Intruder.' Navigate a haunted mansion, solve puzzles, and evade the lurking darkness. A suspenseful horror-adventure that tests your survival instincts.

name: Stellar Bewitching Remastered
description: A Remastered version of the game "Stellar Bewitching!" With brand new character redesigns and art done by Berry B! A Sci-Fi turn-based RPG that takes place parallel to the events of Rave Heart. Featuring teenage drama, touching storylines, and boss battles the likes of which will test your turn-based knowledge!

name: Laruaville 5
description: Use your Match 3 skills to build a ship and help ghosts leave an uninhabited island!

name: Super Bio-Man
description: Super Bio-Man is the ultimate gunslinger and the guardian of our galaxy. Using his arsenal and metal fist, he shows the invaders from outer space - who's the boss here.

name: Maid Cafe: Sexy Secrets
description: Sexy Secrets is an adult content pack for the Maid Cafe game that extends multiple different scenes and events within the game, expanding on them to include more adult content between the protagonist and a variety of characters who appear throughout the game, adding new sexy secret events.

name: Shadows of the Past
description: Shadows of the past is a visual novel for adults only. In a small town, private detective Josh Wilson leads a quiet and measured life, solving small problems for the locals. But everything changes when Ellie shows up on his office doorstep....

name: Isla Mosa Adventure: The Secret of the Southern Capital
description: Players will take control of "Hoki," to explore the unfamiliar and mysterious southern island, "Isla Mosa." In order to secure a place for the villagers on the island, Hoki promises the police to interact with two problematic individuals on the island, investigating the conspiracy behind them...

name: Heroes of Row
description: Auto-Row-Shooter, where you become more powerful with each upgrade you collect! Heroes of Row is a fantasy auto-row shooter game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly snowball against powerful monsters and bosses!

name: Hentai Neon Nights
description: Relaxing puzzle game for a good mood

name: Last Chance in Xollywood: Special Edition
description: This content requires the base game Last Chance in Xollywood on Steam in order to play.

name: Maid Cafe: Delightful Sins Comics
description: New content in the form of comics to collect and read in game, new desserts and new in-game content are added with this DLC. Enjoy the fully uncensored comics within the game at any time as you play via the in-game phone.

name: Expest
description: An arcade-inspired game all about collecting cheese to fulfill your needs. Avoid being exterminated throughout all the levels as you see all the tricks that are used to stop your quest.

name: Rage Simulator
description: Rage Simulator is a minimalist hand-drawn beat-em-up simulator. I made this little game for myself and for you guys, I just wanted to beat something up.

name: Don't Punch Me
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of "Don't Punch Me," the ultimate test of reflexes and restraint! This captivating mobile and computer game challenges your control. Showcase your lightning-fast reflexes as you evade attacks, employ counter-attack moves, and showcase nimble footwork.

name: TrainCraft
description: A nostalgic, retro train management game.

name: Telmari
description: Help Telmari save her Sunflowers on her journey to the Demon Tree, on this precision platformer with your catastic companion. Face over 100 hand-crafted levels where your skill and patience will be tested as you explore the world of Agra.

name: 15 Minutes At The World's End
description: Prepare to embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the chaotic realms of the apocalypse in this intense bullet hell. In a world teetering on the edge of oblivion, you must harness your reflexes, strategic prowess, and sheer determination to survive the onslaught of otherworldly adversaries.

name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition – Hero Cosmetic Pack: Lizzie
description: Meet Lizzie the Pirate (British): Although raised as daughter of an English nobleman, Elisabet Ramsey prefers to be buccaneering in the Caribbean with - and without - Her Majesty's letter of marque.

name: Hentai Beauties
description: Immerse yourself in a world of mesmerizing beauty and relaxing puzzles, accompanied by a soul-soothing soundtrack. Plus, feel free to grab and fiddle around with some boobs for an extra dose of fun!

name: Simulakros
description:
Fight the evil CORP from the inside. Confront deadly robots in this fast-paced third person shooter with rogue-lite elements.

Defy the CORP by using their own creation against them, the Simulakros Unit, equipped with advanced weapons and abilities to wreak havoc to their facilities.

Inside the CORP facilities you will discover powerful chips that you can equip to permanently improve your ability to control Simulakros Units. Each run will grant you experience, allowing you to equip more and more!

name: Floralgraphic Memory
description: After decided to skip school today, Rose whisked himself away to another world full of whimsies and magic.

name: Hollow Home
description: Hollow Home is an isometric narrative RPG about the russian invasion of Ukraine, told from the perspective of a teenager trapped inside an occupied city. Learn survival skills, build relationships and face tough choices as each passing day brings new tragedies and destruction to your childhood home.

name: Draculesti
description: Draculesti is a villain-focused reimagining of the classic novel Dracula that shines a light on the shadowy figures of Renfield, Dracula's Brides, and Dracula himself. Be enthralled by the residents of Castle Dracula, and thrill at a dark narrative with strong LGBTQI+ themes.

name: The Troll
description: The Troll is a troll rom hack of Super Mario 64 made for SimpleFlips's Troll Competition 2023.

name: Imperial Saga: Eclipse
description: Sin descripción

name: Pawafuru Puroyakyu: Eikan Nine Crossroad
description:
Eikan Nine is a mode in which you become a high school baseball coach, train your team, and lead them to the Koshien Japan National High School Baseball Tournament.

Powerful Pro Baseball Eikan Nine Crossroad retains the traditional Eikan Nine setup, but adds new elements for even deeper team building, including “Scholarship Students,” “Growth Board,” and “Rival Schools.”

name: Complex Hero
description: 20 years of production. Complex Hero "Complex Hiro" is a late 90's Super Famicom RPG style game with the theme of "an RPG that is more interesting than nostalgia". A feature-length 2D pixel art sci-fi RPG created with the concept of creating a new version of the classic pixel art RPG of the time.

name: Discarnate
description: Immerse yourself in the chilling ambiance of the 1970s, an era that witnessed the surge of amateur paranormal investigators. Step into their shoes in Discarnate, unearthing authentic demonology lore and summoning a world where malevolent entities lurk. Your task? Bring them to light and banish them.

name: Snowdrop the Blade Master
description: It's a deck building roguelike game with a feature, where the card you played leave a shard that can be used as an extra assistance that will help you to reach your goal.

name: Little Loki & The Yggdrasil Maze
description: A hundred years ago, the defeated Demon Lord Loki has now been resurrected! Disregarding the dissuasion of his former subordinates, Loki is determined to reach the Yggdrasil. Faced with powerful enemies, will Loki be able to succeed in seeking revenge?

name: Tax-Force
description: Hunt down tax-evading mutant billionaires and reinvest in society in this narrative Action Rogue-lite meets Political Sim.

name: Sunfall: Children of Adiona
description: Delve into a psychological sci-fi shooter, masterfully leading a team of 5 characters to harmonious combat brilliance. Navigate heartwarming connections and intense drama, unlocking enhanced combat capabilities to conquer hostile alien fauna and unveil the mystery behind parental disappearance.

name: Lovanium: The Rising Suns
description: Find a way to escape Lovanium before it's too late. Extract resources, trade them, confront the wildest and most dangerous enemies, and fully harness the power of the suns. Are you up for it?

name: Thunder War Rabbit Alien Fight
description: A Cosmic Battle Begins: Thunder War Rabbit to the Rescue!

name: DJMax Respect V: MapleStory Pack
description: DJMax Respect V - MapleStory Pack Now enjoy the songs of MapleStory in DJMaxRespect V.

name: Horses
description: In Horses, you will take on the role of a summer worker taking a break from his college studies. You will be responsible for taking care of the farm and its animals for a fortnight. Each day, as you explore the farm, you'll encounter many "surprises," peeling back the layers of the farm's unsettling mysteries.

name: Son of the Mask
description: A video game based on the movie Son of the Mask made for mobile devices.

name: UnVeil the World
description: Sin descripción

name: Majo no Furo Life
description: Sin descripción

name: WiZmans World ReTry
description: This is a remaster of Jaleco’s RPG WiZmans World released in 2010 on Nintendo DS, now in HD with a 16:9 screen ratio.

name: The Fox Awaits Me Hana
description: In "The Fox Awaits Me Hana," players take on the role of a young man named Takahiro who, after getting lost in the mountains, stumbles upon a mysterious shrine dedicated to the fox deity. He is then suddenly transported to a mystical world where he meets a beautiful fox girl named Hana. As the story progresses, Takahiro learns more about Hana and her past, and the player's choices will determine the outcome of the game.

name: Pettson o Findus i Snickarbon
description: Pettson o Findus i snickarbon is an edutainment game with a collection of mini-games situated in Pettson's workshop. Players will choose a guard for their treasure chest and then will be able to collect gold feathers for every completed activity within the game. Other things can also be collected if found like pieces of a map.

name: Bokura no Keshigomu Otoshi 3 + Special Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Egret II Mini: Arcade Memories Vol. II
description: Sin descripción

name: Cypher 007
description: Cypher 007 is a top-down mobile action game published by Tilting Point. Inspired by 60 years of Spycraft and Cypher 007, players will experience the world of Agent 007 to revisit Bond's most iconic moments and locations. Players are tasked with defeating criminal mastermind Blofeld, head of Spectre, by gathering intel, uncovering secrets, and overcoming immersive levels filled with obstacles, opponents, and objectives that increase in difficulty as they progress. Compete against other 007 agents worldwide via leaderboards to prove who is on top. Cypher 007 is launching into Apple Arcade on September 29.

name: Address1
description: 2D style shoot'em up in which close combat is the primary attack method. With two large swords in her hands, cut her way through enemy bullets and enemy units in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Vilzam: Cosmic Struggle
description: Developed by Yuichi Toyama. Won Second place of the Login Magazine programming contest. Listing was published in the December 1985 magazine.

name: Yoshida Koumuten
description: Yoshida Koumuten a.k.a. Yoshida Builder is the first in the line of 3 shoot'em up editors and the only one only able to make vertical levels. Developed and published by MSX Magazine. Yoshida Koumuten Data Library All 3 Volumes are game collections that hold several different shoot-em-up games.

name: Vacation Tycoon
description:
Build the world's most fabulous vacation resort and go from luxurious to ludicrous!

Redefine what "Vacation" means as you restore your chain of failing resorts and take them from luxurious to ludicrous! In the most literal IDLE game of all time, you will fill your island paradise with the most over-the-top amenities to thrill and delight your visitors. Staffed with the wildest team of managers around, from squids and cyborgs to gurus and ghosts, your vacation destination literally has it all!

name: Nyan Puzzle
description: Nyanpi is a Puzzle game involving you playing as a cat.

name: Turbo Booster
description: It's a tool to start software in R800 mode developed by Kyoto Media.

name: Daymaker: Release From Doomsday
description: Daymaker: Release from Doomsday places you in the shoes of Daymaker, a fictional, friendly AI created by Nintendo during the development of Super Mario Bros. 3 to aid in level creation endeavors. After a routine day of aiding the development team, Daymaker takes a trip through the electrical cords to the residence of a close friend- and finds that her life is in great danger.

name: Effortworld
description: A very difficult hack for SMW with 57 exits

name: Bobble Bash
description: It is a tabletop point collection game, where players bash their way between obstacles to score and win. Think shuffleboard meets bumper cars. Apart of Discord's in-game activity collection.

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land
description: Mario goes to this land. Called Mushroom Rix Land. For his vacation. However, Bowser has taken over this island! Mario must stop him!

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 2: Gimmicky Island
description: The sequel to the first Mario In Mushroom Rix Land game. The story follows after the first Mushroom Rix Land game, Bowser has just escaped with his Clown Cart from Rix Land. He took all resources, from his Rix Land castle. And took them to make his very own island called Gimmicky! And build all the death traps, spikes and more! Mario must stop him! Before the Gimmicky island gets more bigger and bigger and destroy the world!!

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 3: Master Thwomps Avenge
description: After Mario successfully destroy Bowser and his gimmicky island. Mario decided to ask his crew which are all toad members along with Luigi, Yoshi and Peach. To rebuild Rix Land! They rebuild W1: Grassland, W2: Sandy Desert, W3: Blizzard Ice, W4: Industrial City, W5: Mountain Canyon. And they also added a brand new world to Rix Land called, W6: Sky Atmosphere! And finally W7: Abstract Space! However! Master Thwomp when he heard the news that his friend Bowser has been defeated by Mario. Master Thwomp got really mad at this. So, he took over Rix Land to get his avenge on Bowser! Mario must stop Master Thwomp!!!

name: Mario In Mushroom Rix Land 4: Trip To Nano Island
description: A very difficult hack for SMW with 50 exits

name: Brazen Blaze
description:
Brazen Blaze is a 3v3 Smack & Shoot VR Action game with emphasis on close quarter melee combat!
Choose from a range of unique runners each equipped with individual skills meant to destroy whatever blocks your path to sure victory!

name: Freak Factory
description: You are Agent One of the Galactic Police Force and you have been sent to a large factory to stop a Professor who is making gruesome creatures by machines inside five laboratories. The factory is flick-screen viewed from the side at a slightly elevated angle with the screen split into two floors and lifts need to be found and used to move about the floors to find the laboratories.

name: Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster
description: Adventure Kitty: Drill Buster is an action-paced drill game that has you drilling across new terrains and collecting coins to break barriers.

name: J3ss1c4
description: A platformer where you try to escape a laboratory while a robot makes fun of you. Developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

name: Blob Command
description: Match blobs together, create chain reactions and don't run out of time!

name: Blob Command: New Attack
description: Experience more blob action with power-ups and two player co-op!

name: Natural Pressures
description: After a camping trip goes wrong, a terrific storm leaves you trapped in the forest! With minimal resources and a maze-like woodland to escape, you'd do anything to survive...even sacrifice your humanity! Will you keep grinding and fighting for a route home, or submit to the natural pressures and adapt to your new life?

name: Bun 'N' Gun
description: Bun 'N' Gun is a fast action-based run-and-gun game where you command different weapon elements and jump through several action-packed stages full of enemies, traps, and powerups.

name: Counter Snipe
description: In the world of the Sniper there are rarely any second chances. Find and neutralise the enemy sniper before he gets you. Earn cash to buy guns or upgrade them. Single player mode coaches you and refines your skill. Multi-player is where those skills are really put to the test.

name: RDP-Files_
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmogelica
description: Blast off into space! Help Monica and her team explore the galaxy, fight off hordes of enemies, and clean up the mysterious cosmic gel in this retro-arcade inspired action shooter!

name: Crazy Kitchen
description: Hordes of Hungrys are coming in waves. Protect the Kitchen and its precious snacks at all costs!

name: Cube Crusaders
description: Mow down all who stand in the way of your Crusade. Become a benevolent conqueror, or a brutal oppressor to those you achieve victory over. Your actions decide the fate of the planet.

name: B.U.D.D.
description: B.U.D.D. is a cute sci-fi adventure platformer heavily inspired by games and anime from the late 80's.

name: Dogs of the Dark
description: Dogs of the Dark is a role-playing game that pulls inspiration from retro RPGs from the 90s and the quirky ones from the 2000s. It features a full 5+ chapter campaign filled with dumb jokes, strange characters, and retro pixel art graphics akin to 8-bit or 16-bit games.

name: The Search for Tikiman
description: Sin descripción

name: Scruffy's Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Scruffy 3: A Day in the Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Woody's Incredible Journey to the Escape from Eternal Terror
description: Sin descripción

name: Dolan Reborn
description: In Dolan Reborn, random people are disappearing all over, and it's up to you to stop that. Take control of Dolan and go to various locations to pinpoint the person responsible for this. In this journey, you will encounter difficult obstacles, enemies, and bosses so do your best to get to the final act.

name: Octogram
description: Sin descripción

name: 'Round The Mind
description: 'Round The Mind is a hybrid-genre, fast-paced platformer where you, a young therapist kid who is accompanied by a big floating talking TV, help people feel better as a member from the 'Round The Mind organization.

name: Trimurti Online
description: Relive the classic gameplay of an old-school MMORPG. Select a class that suits your style and join your friends to explore the vast world of Trimurti Online. Enhance your equipment and maximize your skills to complete quests, confront monsters and bosses, conquer dungeons, and fight other players!

name: Donny Donut: Dokrats
description:
Donny, Donno and Donna were invited to the ceremony of collaboration with Candy-Land and an other continent, Food-City. Everything was going perfect until a strange wizard, named Brook, enters the President's Palace. He wants to conquer the world and shape it at his mind, with the power of the Dokrats Relics. These are ancient relics from an old civilization, the Dokrats. They are the ancestors of our heroes.
The relics contents an unlimited power that only a pure soul can handle at perfection. Your quest is to get all of the Dokrats Relics and stop Brook. Will you save the world before the revival of the Demon Golem ?

name: Arena Kingdoms
description: Arena Kingdoms is a community battle game where Discord servers play together, compete, and represent their server's HOUSE in weekly Arena Tournaments.

name: Dotty
description: You play as Dotty, a cute little ladybug who can shoot glitter from her fingertips!

name: Zorropa y La Torre de las Sombras
description:
Zorropa is a young fox that has to leave his house due to some spiky plants growing all over the island, it is at this moment that your adventure begins.
Use your abilities to make your way into towers that behold the power of the sun, maybe with this power you can save the island, or start an adventure and save the world.

name: Candy Rangers
description: Fight nature in Candy Rangers, an on-rails shooter game where you control 4 characters at once. Shoot down chains of enemies, don't run out of time and find medals to unlock new levels, areas and boss fights! Use your team wisely!

name: Jimmy's Lost Fruits Journey 2: Veggocalypse
description: Jimmy's Lost Fruits Journey 2: Veggocalypse is an Earthworm Jim and Jazz Jackrabbit 2-inspired shoot-em-up platformer with fluent & wacky animation, high-speed moveset, and lots of fruit-filled action!

name: Croaking Around
description:
Use your tongue to pull, sling and swing acrobatically to get around the hazardous underground.
The game focuses on simple platforming gameplay combined with spectacular aerial acrobatics and a cute cartoony artstyle.
It's pure fun for the whole family (it's singleplayer so you're going to have to take turns sorry).

name: Lumiva Legacy
description: Lumiva Legacy is a fast-paced action platformer about three young multivas, Alex "Bingo" Rivero, Salamon Avery, and Roy Cruz, on their journey to stop D-Tech from invading their home of Neuo Town. The trio will have to put their skills to the test to conquer many challenges, defeat countless foes, and explore exotic locations with their various abilities and the help of Elemental Charges!

name: Harrow
description: Harrow is a culmination of several nightmares. All of these nightmares were in an old 1995-1998 horror video game setting. It's also heavily inspired by the Silent Hill series, as that has been an influence for many of my nightmares. That's why the game is themed the way that it is. By entering this game, you are entering the embodiment of the nightmares, and because of this, you should proceed with caution.

name: Honey Bunny
description: Honey Bunny is a bartender at Lucky Rabbit's Foot Casino, the cutest casino in all of Starlight City! She's busy at work when the no-good gang, The Cool Cats, steals away the casino and the entire city's supply of cocktail cherries. Chase them down as Honey Bunny using your ears to headbutt enemies, grab items, and platform around the city as you recover as many cherries as possible!

name: Dirappen Restoration
description: The planet has been overrun! Play as the lone Dirappen Soldier Unit D6-4 in its epic quest to defeat the alien invaders and restore the planet of Darptha to the rightful rule of King Darpon.

name: Hyperlight
description: Sin descripción

name: Anjelo's Province
description: Anjelo's Province is a fan-made remake of Anjelo's Land.

name: Meander Land
description: Meander Land is a remake of Anjelo's Province with new original characters, a new story, and a ton of quality-of-life improvements.

name: The Sims 4: Poolside Splash Kit
description: Turn heads at the pool with bright and playful swimwear from The Sims 4 Poolside Splash Kit.

name: Tower of Dreams
description: Climb your way to the top of the tower in this vertical platforming roguelike! Bound off walls, discover fantastical items, and make use of Dream Knight's sword to bounce off of obstacles!

name: The Sims 4: Modern Luxe Kit
description: Treat yourself to luxurious modern furniture that says “I made it” with The Sims 4 Modern Luxe Kit.

name: Arcade Archives: Zing Zing Zip
description:
"ZING ZING ZIP" is a shooter released by ALLUMER in 1992.
Operate the 1P aircraft with fast vertical movement speed or the 2P aircraft with fast horizontal movement speed to defeat the evil empire.
Aim to clear the screen by making full use of various items and rolling special moves that make you invincible or power up while activated

name: Puzzle Journey
description:
"Wild Waters and Earthy Wonders: A Matching Adventure"

Explore the captivating world of land and sea creatures in this thrilling card matching game.
Test your memory and observation skills as you uncover pairs of enchanting images depicting animals from both the wild waters and the earthy wonders.
With four challenging difficulty modes, embark on an adventure filled with fun and discovery.
Match, explore, and win as you unravel the mysteries behind each card.

name: 2044 Moto Racer: Cyber Racing Simulator
description: Unleash Your Inner Speed Demon in the Neon-Lit Streets!

name: Rally Racing: Cars & Drift Mania
description: Rev up your engines in Rally Racing.

name: Teocida + Estigma
description: Enter the surrealistic horror world of Teocida+Estigma!

name: Ruinsmagus: Complete
description: Complete the Magic – The complete edition of RUINSMAGUS includes both the main game and its DLC, The Warrior and the Tailor, all in one convenient bundle. Everything is included! This also includes full English voice-over, and you can also enjoy the original Japanese voice-over with English subtitles.

name: Isonzo: First Wave
description: Enhance your Isonzo experience by requisitioning a variety of cosmetic Unit Pack DLCs with the Wave sets! First Wave includes all the core Isonzo Unit Pack DLCs: the Reserve Units, Veteran Units, Elite Units, and Alpine Units.

name: Train Simulator: Norfolk Southern SD70ACU
description: Now, you can climb aboard the powerful Norfolk Southern SD70ACU, as created by developer Travel by Train, to haul heavy tonnage in Train Simulator Classic!

name: Hotel Renovator: Disco Room & Furniture Set
description: Get ready to boogie down and transform your hotel into dazzling disco paradises with the Disco Room & Furniture Set for Hotel Renovator! Step into the glitzy world of disco with this sizzling hot DLC that adds a burst of retro energy to your hotel renovations.

name: BobsleighX
description: You will feel the thrill of speed in the BobsleighX.

name: DNF Duel: DLC 2 - Brawler
description: 'Brawler' can be used in DNF Duel.

name: Red Tie Runner
description: Red Tie Runner is a simple but challenging 2D platformer. Put on a red tie and step into stick-figure shoes to navigate through 30 levels so intense you might just forget about the impending heat death of the universe.

name: Travis' Coward Combustion
description:
In this fast-paced action platformer, you delve into Lost Angeles, a city plagued by supernatural parasites called "wisps". Aside from looking suspiciously cute and marketable, wisps can possess human hosts and give them supernatural abilities in exchange for the person's free will. When a wisp gets bored enough, it breaks the connection to find a new host, leaving the current one behind with severe injuries in the process.

In order to protect the city, a governmental organization was created: P.C.E., which exists to Protect, Contain and Exterminate this threat and keep Lost Angeles at peace.

But what happens when someone is unfortunate enough to be possessed by no mere wisp, but one megalomaniac enough to drag its host around in a rampage quest?

name: Susan Taxpayer
description: Susan Taxpayer is a free 2D platformer made in the SMBX2 engine, meant to imitate the likes of the later Wario Land games, with music by the Super Lesbian Animal RPG Composer, Beatrix Quinn! Follow Susan and her coworker Franky as she powers through the worst workday ever. Help her platform through a myriad of office-themed levels, from orientation videos to mailrooms to forests made of printer paper!

name: Slender: The Arrival
description: Slender Man returns more terrifying than ever. You're on your own. No one to help you. No one to hear you scream. Relive the horror all over again with cutting edge visuals for the 10th Anniversary Update and experience survival horror at its finest.

name: The Moshpit Tournament
description:
"The Moshpit" is a Horde Mode TPS Single Player game, where you gun down waves of enemy Cyphers that assault you from every side!

Waves ​have a fixed set of points to be won. The faster you complete the wave & squash your opponents, the MORE points you'll WIN!

name: Spasms of Stupidity
description: PC wargame-Roguelike, inspired from DragonForce(Saturn)

name: 100 Halloweens
description: Trapped in a mansion filled with 100 years of darkness... Fight or hide, stay alive and set things right.

name: Battle Leet
description: Dive into Battle Leet - a 3D PvP arena where skill & strategy reign. Customize your Leet, earn rewards, and dominate in NFT-fueled battles. Be the ultimate gamer in this digital showdown.

name: Bird of Paradise
description: In the backdrop of the Bhopal Gas Tragedy of 1984, former couple Jheel and Agneya encounter each other at a therapist's clinic but neither of them are willing to disclose their reason for the visit. Help them piece together their past in order to unravel their respective reasons.

name: Nextbots In The Backrooms
description: They only look ridiculous at first glance, but they're not! Run. Don't stop, don't try to hide, just run!

name: CryptoClash
description: Welcome to CryptoClash, the ultimate free-to-play multiplayer shooter that thrusts you into a cyberpunk world like no other. Are you ready to dominate the neon-soaked chaos and emerge as a legendary champion?

name: City Ambulance Car Driving
description: Take ill people to emergency hospital in this ambulance game. If you like to play simulation games, this ambulance game is for you.

name: Kakele Online: MMORPG - Bonanza
description: Are you ready for the new content ranging levels 50-800+? Discover the new dwarven mountains and mines and go deep in exploration of their caves. Join us to explore all the new features of this Major Update!

name: Colossal Cave Adventure
description: Original Colossal Cave Adventure for Playdate

name: GravytX The Gravytoid
description: Play as GravytX an alien who has the ability to control objects remotely and manipulate gravity. Travel the universe to save the peoples who are under the domination of the Vodouas (Malicious beings who want to conquer the universe) and bring peace to their Planets.

name: Beefy Brad the Muscle Man
description: Help Brad Flex to Impress (Playdate)

name: Pigs Can Fly
description: Crank your Playdate to fly as a pig, but avoid the birds or it's game over. A simple arcade game made in one day.

name: Dressed to Kill Sherlock Holmes for Playdate & C64!
description: playdate and c64 double feature!

name: NBA 2K24: 25th Anniversary Edition
description: Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy loads of pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPlayer options in MyCareer. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Feel more responsive gameplay and polished visuals while playing with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams.

name: Foreverhood
description: The premise of Foreverhood is abstract. You are one of the Nuu, a childhood race of creatures that spend their time daydreaming on a small planet of woods and mountains. The player awakes one day to find themselves under an overcast sky with everyone distraught over the change that is in the air. You navigate the space under the watch of the Sequas or parents of the world to uncover what is beyond the clouds and what lies in store for the world of your kind.

name: I Can Transform
description: In this game you will use your special costume which allows you to transform into mechanical objects (car, rocket, helicopter, magnet, motorcycle, ...) to avoid obstacles, collect vortex gems in levels and defeat the Assas (the bad guys who want to destroy the world).

name: Supersonic
description: Race on tracks created from your own music.

name: The Top Hat Club
description:
Gain entry to the exclusive club where top hats are a strict dress code requirement. The Top Hat Club is a platform game where you must collect the top hat on each level before you can get into the club. There are a variety of obstacles to overcome, and collecting all of the coins on each level provides a further challenge for the completist gamer. The game includes over 30 levels, awards and secrets to unlock. Presented in glorious monochrome with a pseudo-Victorian style.
A total remake of the original browser game with high-resolution graphics, a new control system and widescreen support.

name: Tower Stack
description:
Tower stack is a simple yet very fun and addictive game.Try your best to build the highest tower ever!
Tap the screen to release a block of tower. Release the tower blocks with caution and accurate estimation or it will fall off. There is no time limit.

name: UFO Slide Racing
description:
Be there when the UFO masters of the universe have the final showdown! Bump and slide through six entertaining sci-fi race tracks and be the number one!
Fine tune your racing lines, slide like a pro and achieve the perfect lap. Easy to learn, hard to master.

name: Music in Motion
description:
Music in Motion is a fun and casual rhythm game that will make you move to the beat of great EDM, pop, epic and dubstep music!
In this innovative game you will have to move your phone with the music!
Scrolling lights of different shapes and colors will indicate how to move your phone: in front of you, towards you, to the left or to the right, as if you were playing drums.
The 5 motion controls of the game appear progressively and are easy to learn.
Packed with over 30 songs, you'll have plenty of genres to choose from.

name: Seven Knights Idle Adventure
description: A new chapter of Seven Knights unfolds! Meet new heroes, as well as familiar faces from other Seven Knights games, and join them on their exciting adventure!

name: Power Inc
description: Power Inc is an idle simulation game about managing a power plant from the 1890s. Use the power you generate to build a city, research new technologies, and advance through the eras to modern times and beyond!

name: Octopuz
description:
Octopuz will keep your mind and fingers sharp with its deceptively difficult memory puzzles.
The rules are easy. Replicate the pattern. Each puzzle piece has eight options. Tap your way through each puzzle as you race against the clock and train your brain.

name: Nuts & Bolts Puzzle
description:
Immerse yourself in a maze of twisted iron sheets and plates, pinned with discarded bolt pieces and rings, presenting an epic and complex puzzle match.
As a seasoned technician, skillfully unblock screws and untangle each twisted iron piece from the jigsaw of obstacles.
Navigate through carefully crafted levels, facing a mesh of tangled metal plates, rings, and ropes at every turn.
Untangle the ropes and free the iron pieces to experience the intricate yet rewarding world of Nuts & Bolts.
Some levels introduce metal art created from metal plates, while in others, you will use a handsaw to cut these plates and expose more holes to pin your bolts.
Do you have the vision and brainpower to untangle these mazes in the township? Get ready to challenge your intelligence and become a legend in bridge construction.

name: MultiWords
description:
Your task is simple - You have 8 letters, how many unique words can you find? The longer the word, the more points you get!
Challenge the world everyday with everyone getting the same letters! See if you are the best everyday or if you have the best MultiWords streak!

name: Light and Shadows: Pocket Islands
description: Light and Shadows: Pocket Islands is a spin-off made for fun, inspired by the retro game of peak 8 where the levels are only simple and challenging while progressing​.

name: Aura Kingdom 2: Evolution
description:
《Aura Kingdom 2: Evolution》Unleash Legendary Eidolons, Evolve Your Adventure!
Dive into a vast world and immerse yourself in a new fantasy!
Experience the evolution of an anime fantasy adventure MMO in the massive world of《Aura Kingdom》, featuring 5 major upgraded systems. Embark on your heroic journey with stunning legendary Eidolons by your side!

name: Elemento 23
description: Elemento is a Creature that live in parallel universe #23. You even cannot see or hear him. Elemento is always hungry. Feed him!

name: Eat Your Vegetables!
description:
Who would have thought eating your vegetables would be so much fun?
Super simple, yet addictive game play! Can you tap and swipe? If so, you are qualified to Eat Your Vegetables.
Make sure to only eat your vegetables and avoid eating things like rocks, nails, jewelry, hair picks, pitchforks, lava lamps, alien ray guns, and anything else that flies at you!
Play with 6 unique unlockable characters, each with 3 levels of difficulty including; 1 & 1, Multiple Vegetables, and with Distractions! Make sure you keep your baby from being distracted by swiping or tapping away dogs, flies, disco music, earthquakes, asteroid fields, sudden thunderstorms, and UFO’s.
Try and beat your friend’s score on the leaderboard, or try to reach the highest score by eating all your vegetables.

name: Duckstazy Classic
description: While Duck is jumping too high, that time to examine your skills. Collect smiles and avoid bad trip guys to beat your friends!

name: Clone Dots
description:
Say “Hello!” to Dolly the Sheep and her “Clone Dots”!
“Clone Dots - Color Lines Mania” is simple and addictive puzzle game for everyone!
It’s about cloning dots and making lines at least of 4 dots.
But! You also can use 4 bonuses to help you! Make more color lines with Dolly the Sheep and get clovers. Use clovers to buy bonuses. Clone color dots, collect clovers, use bonuses, set new records and compete with your friends!

name: Flappy Helix
description:
The helix dodging challenge and addictive gameplay mechanics!
Easy one tap controls.
Flap through the helix, get stars, beat the best score and play more to unlock new worlds and characters.
Can you be a flappy master?

name: Lunar Lander Mission
description:
Fly your ship between landing pads in low gravity to compete on online leader boards.
Compare your best times with players around the world. Are you the best pilot?

name: Let's Jump
description:
Jump towards greatness through a colorful world of beauty and danger.
Collect jumpers on your way and try to get them all to the finish line.
On your way the jumpers will encounter multiple obstacles like spikes, rotating hammers, swinging balls and even red evil jumpers coming from the opposite direction.
Try to survive the jumping chaos and do the victory dance.

name: HiLight: Touch the light!
description: Track the light at full speed and… if you can, follow its path. Light is unpredictable and playful to lose the player. Your playground ? Picturesque landscapes which you will discover as you are making progress. Start from the twilight… Will you be able to go all the way up to lighten the landscapes ?

name: Head Bangerz
description: Do you have what it takes to survive and conquer obstacles in a bouncy, suspenseful, and exciting 2D environment? Choose your head and prepare yourself for an unexpected and enjoyable experience.

name: Ruinsmagus: The Warrior and the Tailor
description: Adorned with shops, a river, and new townsfolk Grand Amnis has never felt more alive with this brand-new area! When exploring this new area, Iris and you discover a mysterious shop. Enchanted by its offerings, Iris is drawn in to learn more about its wares and terrifying shopkeeper….

name: World Quest
description: A sidescrolling shoot 'em up where you control a fighter pilot assigned to attack alien bases. The player's ship can be upgraded so that it can fire in multiple directions and the player can use bombs. Along the way, humans can be saved for additional points.

name: ScooMart
description: ScooMart is an indie horror game that plunges you into a meticulously crafted world filled with dread and suspense. As the protagonist, you stumble upon the gas station while on a dreaded road trip. What begins as a routine stop for gas quickly turns into a nightmare of supernatural proportions.

name: Jammo
description: This was an individual project to learn about game development. The game is a third person shooter with some platforming. As you progress through the levels, you will be able to access an array of guns and abilities to help through the game.

name: Hentai Vivian
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Scary Maze Game
description: You and up to 5 friends need to find the exit of a maze, beware of the monster that lurks in the shadows.

name: Escape from Toilets
description: Escape from Toilets is a coop horror game 1 to 4 players in a session. Go through strange rooms, escape from toilets that want to kill you and other dangers in the form of challenges and puzzles. Realistic graphics, easy controls and creepy atmosphere will immerse you in the game.

name: CyberSkyscrUpper
description: This game has no text and can be played in any language! There are no repeating annoying sprites in the game! You get into the building of a space elevator, but it turns out that the elevator is broken and you have to go upstairs on foot, it will be an unforgettable Cyber Trip.

name: Play Minigames with Reiko
description: Build an unbreakable friendship with Reiko as you earn tickets and have fun with over 30 minigames in the exciting world of 'Play Minigames with Reiko'.

name: Dreamsweeper
description:
The floor isn’t lava, it’s Minesweeper!
A Dungeon Crawler x Minesweeper Roguelike and a lo-fi musical experience like no other game before.
Navigate worlds by solving Minesweeper rooms and fight your anxieties with the power of lo-fi music. This is the story of a girl who goes to sleep listening to music every night, and awakens in a dream world to face her nightmarish anxieties.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - When Shadows Dance
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary Weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Hayalî (Legendary Hunter), Karagöz (Legendary Springfield 1866) , Hacivat (Legendary Scottfield Model 3 Swift) & Lamba (Legendary Alert Trip Mine)

name: Black Smith 4
description: You are a blacksmith in a small rural village. You steadfastly earn your living by hammering out products daily, but at night, you take your earnings and go to town to seek out innocent and cute girls. Continue improving your experience and skills, so that you can raise the price of your products.

name: Blitz & Blaze
description: Unleash the power of Blitz the rat and Blaze the firefly in this mesmerizing platformer. Explore diverse dimensions, solve puzzles, and discover the magic of cooperation!

name: College Sex Party
description: Welcome to the world of College Sex Party - an exciting visual novel that immerses you in an unforgettable and enticing student life!

name: Froggin' Around
description: A little frog in a little pond eatin' bugs, takin' naps, and just froggin' around.

name: Pixel Dash
description: Pixel dash is a fast-paced platformer focused on allowing every player to feel what it is like to be a speedrunner.

name: Hot Lap Racing
description: Awaken Your Inner Champion! Hot Lap Racing is a simcade racing game where you will discover the history of motorsport from GT Cross to Formula 1 and race against your friends or compete against players online!

name: Degradation: Kyomu's Fury
description: Fight viruses, survive insane waves of rays and bullets, and find out more about the inhabitants of the Network in this mix of exploration and 3D bullet-hell/FPS game.

name: Paraido
description: Paraido is a unique and relaxing puzzle game. Complete levels by moving and rotating hexagonal-shapes into their correct positions.

name: Secrets of the Room 3: The Girl Group Back to the Night
description: Wake up to attach themselves to love beans, it is said that our group to collapse the house? Return to the night, but the sound source was stolen by hackers; Female group members black material scandal is constantly exposed; A thrilling bureau in the bureau, launched at this point......

name: Original Soul
description: "Shoot, Slash, Dodge" rogue-lite, action shooter dual-core game!! Cyber ​​city in the future world. In order to stop the evil conspiracy of Group Z, Agents Alice and Teresa - under the control of you as the player, fight against the leader of Group Z, Dr. Jacob, and his monsters army.

name: Alien Battle Champions
