description: Collect and enslave alien creatures. Increase your creatures skills by gaining experience from battles. Collect resources to craft armor and nanites so that you can collect even more creatures. Battle other players online and become the champion.

name: Vast
description: Vast is a virtual platform by Sandman Studios that uses Unreal Engine 5 to create immersive experiences. Creators can build their own worlds and attend thousands of events. Vast collaborates with curators to provide the best immersive experiences.

name: Close to Flight
description: Grab your grappling hook and pack your bag and swing through the skies, filled with floating islands and colourful characters eagerly awaiting new adventures!

name: Barbarian Saga: The Beastmaster
description: A classic hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania action game, it's time for revenge! Use your Beastmaster skills to unleash your inner beast, fight with your heart-devouring sword and end the threat to Arborea, you decide the ending.

name: Yeon-oh and Seo
description: Success and failure, love and friendship, dream and reality. The story about our choices in the meantime. A real passionate romance interactive game.

name: The Boy and the Cathedral
description: Drawn to a mysterious cathedral, a boy sets out to unlock its secret.

name: Hana Exposure! A Blooming Flower
description: Hana Exposure! is an exhibitionism focused narrative RPG. Follow Hana as she works and spends time in River Town, where she will get into embarrassing situations, unintentionally become exposed, wear revealing outfits, and slowly awaken her exhibitionist side!

name: How to Lose One's Virginity
description: "How to Lose One's Virginity" is an adult visual novel that describes the process of self-discovery... and hot beauties. Playing the role of a loser, are you able to change your life and become someone women are very fond of and build your own harem?

name: Spirit of the Island: Adventureland
description: Rejoice, Adventurers: A brand new way to entertain your guests is coming up to the tropical world of Spirit of the Island. Please welcome: Adventureland! Are you ready to build your own tropical amusement park?

name: HellFight
description: Hellfight is a combat focused platformer that combine the experience of roguelike and soul-like mechanics.

name: Myth or Reality: Mystery of the Lake - Collector's Edition
description: Follow the footsteps of the Loch Ness monster and reveal the secret of the legendary Loch Ness Lake! Better be careful to avoid being another appetizer for Nessie…

name: Reality Patrol
description: Reality patrol is third person stealth-action game. Travel through time to different eras to protect history from fanatics and terrorists.

name: Rubinite
description: "Rubinite" is a dark fantasy boss rush action game that utilizes the unique mechanic "Focus" to pinpoint enemies' weaknesses and execute thrust attacks. Follow Ruby, a princess who has escaped from the Scarlet Kingdom, embarking on a journey of revenge to reclaim her kingdom.

name: Lost Cats
description: Lost Cats is a 4 vs 1 online horror game, play with or against your friends and randoms! Collect perks and cats to dominate the game! Build your own sets, be creative! Have Fun!

name: Highway Getway
description: "Highway Getway" is a car parkour type game. The player controls a car to drive on the highway. There is a lot of game money on the road. The player can get the game money when he controls the car.

name: Aboriginal
description: Embark on an epic adventure in "Aboriginal," tapping into inherited powers and unraveling ancestral mysteries. Traverse India and the mystic Tiroti Islands, inspired by the real-life isolated Sentinel Island in the Indian Ocean, on a journey of self-discovery and redemption.

name: Endless RPG: Untold Tales
description: Craft a party of diverse characters, each with customizable skills and looks. Explore a living world with dynamic day-night cycles, changing seasons, and diverse biomes. Embark on an epic journey where you shape your destiny as the director of your unique story.

name: Unparalleled
description: This is a wonderful little game.

name: Sanguo's Ambition 4: Three Kingdoms
description: The world's first competitive SLG strategy game with real-time matchmaking for multiplayer battles. In 《Three Kingdoms Ambition 4》 you can experience the unique journey of starting as a small faction and growing into a powerful warlord during the turbulent Three Kingdoms era.

name: Eon: Reset
description: Explore Eon Association in the wake of an apocalyptic disaster. Maneuver the artificial life Eon-3033 to battle paranormal entities. Experience an exciting 2D combat in a world where elemental forces exist. Peel back the threads of ambiguous narrative and discover the secrets of time and fate.

name: Chroma Wars
description: A retro, turn-based strategy game on a square-map where you engage in techno-fantasy warfare! Command magical armies, repel abyssal foes, and conquer the world in high-skill strategic battles.

name: Freaky Trip
description: Put your imagination to the test and go on a freaky rescue trip. Help rescue Salcy’s beloved cockapoo from unknown danger in which she was sure to find herself. In Freaky Trip you will encounter many logical puzzles, which you can find everywhere.

name: Eden's Guardian
description: Where shadow falls, it begins. Dive into Eden's Guardian, a challenging metroidvania experience with handmade pixel art set in a world with medieval and fantasy aesthetics devastated by conflict where the history of Gods and humans intertwine.

name: Alien
description: 'Alien' is a cartoon style 2D platform jumping type game. Players need to control their characters to avoid the enemy and finally reach the end to win.

name: School Girl Simulator
description: School Girl Simulator game has two players in a high-security school - a fragile and brash student against a strict and fierce teacher. The student's task is to find a way to pass the exams and not be caught, while the teacher has to catch her and punish her.

name: Ares Fighter 3
description: "Ares Fighter 3" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

name: Isonzo: Glacial Units Pack
description: The ‘Glacial Units’ pack contains a series of uniforms for unprepared troops struggling to keep warm or stay concealed in the freezing conditions of the wintery Alps. This pack has two sets of mostly improvised uniforms for all classes, plus moustaches and beards, facial items, and faces.

name: Survivors
description: Travel through an unknown alien world, collecting new weapons to fight alien monsters and upgrading the Time Tank to withstand hordes of unknown monsters.

name: Static Mag
description: Static Mag is an FPS where you use a magnet enhancement to steal weapons and evolve movement.

name: Liminal Border Part I
description: First game of a four-part visual novel series. Nerdy Itsuki Ninomae accidentally creates a “digital hypnotism movie.” Showing it to his neighbor causes him to learn her and a classmate’s dark secret, dragging him into the underbelly of society.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Tirsan Trailer Pack
description: Tirsan, based in Türkiye, is a top producer of high-quality trailers for business needs. With more than 45 years of experience, they are known for their creative designs, excellent construction, and great customer support.

name: Trials of Randoom
description: Trials Of Randoom is a unique puzzle game with immense challenges and great mysteries. Each level is unique and your experience will be unforgettable as you solve the puzzles to advance through the different levels.

name: Malkin
description: Malkin is a 2D, hand-drawn, atmospheric RPG. A quest to find the blood of a murderer leads a witch into ever deeper mysteries. Expect intricate storylines with multiple endings and combat that poses a balanced challenge.

name: Silent Paws: Winter Quest
description: Embark on an enchanting journey with Silent Paws: Winter Quest, where the fate of a mystical world rests in your paws. As a cunning fox, you must venture forth into a breathtakingly immersive landscape teetering on the brink of eternal winter.

name: Necroslayer
description: Necroslayer is a dark fantasy styled, open world roguelite game. Play as one of several characters unlocked through the story, in first person action combat, with meta progression to improve stats and survivability each play through.

name: Jackpot 3
description: Jackpot 3 is a casual game. Before starting the game, you need to bet first. After the bet, the small ball will start to turn again. When the small ball stops on a certain number, that number is the winning number.

name: The Merlies
description: Meet the Merlies, a tiny birds community trying to find harmony in a world where the remains of an ancient civilisation are still visible. Build your village ingeniously, gather your birdies and explore this way-too-big world in this cute post-apocalyptic adventure ! Ready to spread your wings?

name: Relight The Dark
description: Relight The Dark is a short horror experience about a girl living with her abusive mother. After finding some dark secrets about her mother, the girl has to find a way to escape the house and get to safety.

name: Ashcroft
description: Ashcroft is a high-intensity Platform Fighter in which you have one hour to fight your way out of a zombie infested city. Are you a bad enough dude to save your friends and get out alive? How many zombies can you punch before they eat you alive?

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 1: Archer's Paradox
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: Milu Milan
description: Milu Milan is a casual game of architectural maze exploration and puzzle solving.

name: Playtown
description: Playtown is a horror game set in a kid's abandoned indoor playground. Roam the abandoned kids play areas to uncover and find your daughter's necklace, while unraveling the mystery surrounding the once happy place. Remember, you are not alone - as danger can be lurking at every corner.

name: Live Hard, Die Hard
description: I can't live like this! But, I won't die like this either! Do you want a mix of hard battles and cutting-edge medical treatment?! Then Live Hard, Die Hard is the strategy game for you! Use violence and science to stop the invasion and get those pesky aliens off of our planet!

name: Crisol: Theater of Idols
description: What would you do if your blood were your only weapon? How much would you sacrifice your life? Experience the unholy island of Tormentosa in this twisted first-person adventure full of horror and action where only your blood can be used to defeat the impious creatures that roam therein.

name: Fishyphus
description: Traverse an impressionistic sea, listening for predator and prey. Cast a lure and feel their cues to reel them in. The reaper slowly tracks your movements, who you must outmaneuver to survive.

name: Mineral Madness
description: Mineral Madness is a fast-paced battle arena where you go head-to-head against rival moles as you race to collect the most minerals. Create mayhem as you blast your way through the fully destructible underground to become the number one mole miner!

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 2: Hunting Grounds
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 3: First Ones
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 4: Impossible Objects
description: Experience the exciting universe of The Expanse like never before in Telltale’s latest adventure, The Expanse: A Telltale Series. Follow Cara Gee, who reprises her role as Camina Drummer, and explore the dangerous and uncharted edges of the Belt aboard the the Artemis. From scavenging wrecked ships in a zero-g environment, to surviving a mutiny, to combating fearsome pirates, you make the difficult choices and reveal Camina Drummer’s resolve in this latest Telltale adventure.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Episode 5: Europa's Folly
description: Immerse yourself in the role of Camina Drummer, the Executive Officer aboard the Artemis, a scavenging ship hunting for a big score in the outer regions of the Belt. You must corral a crew rife with tense relationships and powerful personalities, and make tough decisions that will decide everyone’s fate.

name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Archangel Bonus Episode
description: A bonus DLC episode for The Expanse announced as part of its Deluxe Edition and set to be released after the 5 episode story is finished in September.

name: Kill The Topulus
description: Kill The Topulus is a simple first person shooter, shoot accurately to survive the attacks of giant rats and become a master of the Topulus by completing all the challenges in each level.

name: Hansel and Gretel: Interactive Book
description: Hansel and Gretel. Interactive classic stories that always surprise you.

name: Cube Merge 2048
description: Welcome to Cube Merge 2048: Your Mystical Forest Puzzle Sensation! Embark on a captivating journey through the heart of a mystical magical forest, where the power of merging and strategy collide in the ultimate puzzle adventure.

name: Forest Crash Party
description:
Two people rather than playing alone
more than playing together

name: League of Champions Soccer 2024
description: Live the new Champions European League Soccer Competition like real players do. Choose your team and play the matches of the real draw until the final.

name: The Hunt
description: A supernatural killer stalks five camp counsellors through lethal nightmares in a psychological game that blurs the line between reality and the subconscious.

name: Monster Collections Plus
description: Monster Collections Plus is an unlicensed Pokémon game based on the game Culdcept.

name: Super Mario 3D Kart Deluxe
description: Super Mario 3D Kart Deluxe is an unlicensed J2ME game based on the Mario Kart series.

name: QatQi
description:
You know that feeling you get when you finish every path and cover every square inch of a map in an RPG? When you apply that concept to the word game genre, you get QatQi.

The levels in QatQi are designed with many large, open rooms, much like dungeons. There are several gold coins hidden in each of those rooms, and discovering them will result in massive score bonuses. You can view a detailed breakdown of your performance for each level you complete, including factors such as word length, effectiveness, and gold coins, among others.

name: Super Mario Sayajin Aventura
description: Super Mario Sayajin Aventura is an unlicensed 2D platformer for mobile devices featuring a Super Saiyan version of Mario.

name: Silent Scale
description: Silent Scale is a music themed rom hack for Super Mario 64. It was made for the SimpleFlips Music Themed Level Competition, where it ranked 28th place.

name: Wordle
description: An unofficial variant of Wordle for the NES.

name: Tetsu 1: Densha de Battle!
description: Tetsu 1: Densha de Battle! is a Racing game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by Syscom, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Bed Wars
description: Bedwars is a teamwork PVP game, you will be battling your opponents on islands in the sky, protect your bed and try to destroy your opponents' bed to prevent them from respawning, beat all the opponents to win the game!

name: Star Trek: Infinite - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Travle
description: Travle is a daily country guessing game, where players must create a route from one given country to another which passes through the fewest amount of countries possible.

name: Another Reverie
description: A small game about moving on.

name: Puzzle Kombat
description: A puzzle game with the Mortal Kombat motif.

name: Lylia's Deadline
description: Lylia's Deadline is an action-platformer inspired by games such as Mega Man X, focusing on new mechanics and movements.

name: Mr. Triangle Mania 2
description: Mr. Triangle Mania 2 is a platformer-shooter game with a stupid and wacky meme filled plot.

name: Bendy: The Silent City
description: Sin descripción

name: HooperVania
description: Welcome to HooperVania, a free and non-profit French fan game celebrating Castlevania, the French videomaker Hooper, his community, and video games as a whole! Navigate through various stages using the famous Vampire Killer to defeat numerous enemies, and large bosses and ultimately vanquish Dracula himself!

name: The Chronos Event
description: The Chronos Event is a fast-paced third-person shooter that emphasizes the tactics of time travel and fast, aggressive play. Players rewind time, battling alongside their younger selves against overwhelming opposition.

name: Superior Relatives
description: Superior Relatives is a couch-based multiplayer fighting game. Choose from a variety of balls and battle it out with up to four players in online multiplayer. Enjoy a variety of maps and characters, as you battle it out to be the ultimate champion.

name: Foxes Need to Eat
description: Control an adorable fox in scenarios full of traps and obstacles.

name: Demegraunt
description: The two heroes are trying to escape from an abandoned planet after a shipwreck, breaking through the wild environment and automated security systems.

name: Cosmic Cowabunnies
description: Play as "Sauce," the Grey Alien, on a critical mission to hide alien evidence from humanity. Abduct, rescue, mine, and unravel Earth's mysteries. Battle formidable foes and prove your skills on the intergalactic leaderboard. Prevent disclosure, or the truth is out!

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 6
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki accepting an invitation from her friend Sienna to go out drinking in a club, only to end up fucked in the restroom by the blonde's cocky boyfriend.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Peaceful Pines Course
description: Become one with nature with the new Peaceful Pines Pack.

name: Hotel: Lake Edition
description: The Lake Edition adds an additional resort location: an idyllic lake and the surrounding forest. A true haven of tranquillity, it's an ideal place to build a hotel for holidaymakers seeking nature and the great outdoors.

name: Hotel: Lake DLC
description: This DLC adds an additional resort location: an idyllic lake and the surrounding forest. This haven of tranquillity is an ideal place to build a hotel for holidaymakers seeking nature and the great outdoors!

name: EXE Clash
description: A platform fighting game featuring many spooky video game creepypastas.

name: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Humanity's Last Hope
description: It is a game created for the SNV community to recreate the most epic battles in anime.

name: Papa's Cheeseria To Go!
description:
Papa's Cheeseria is kicking off its grand opening with a special performance by the high-energy band, Scarlett and the Shakers! Unfortunately the concert is canceled when all of the music gear is stolen, and you'll need to pick up a job to afford buying new instruments for the band. Thankfully Papa Louie has the perfect solution for you: He's putting you in charge of making grilled cheese sandwiches in his newest restaurant!

You'll need to prepare sandwiches with delicious breads, melty cheeses, and a wide array of toppings and sauces for a gourmet grilled cheese. Cook and flip the sandwiches to grill them just right, and finish your customers' orders with a heaping order of fresh french fries covered in their favorite sauces and toppings. The town of Toastwood will celebrate different holidays throughout the year, and you'll unlock new festive ingredients as you go to serve up delicious seasonal sandwiches.

HOLIDAY FLAVORS - Celebrate the seasons in Toastwood with tasty holiday flavors! Your customers will order sandwiches stacked high with seasonal ingredients. You'll unlock new breads, cheeses, toppings, and sauces for each holiday of the year, and your customers will love trying these festive flavors. This new version adds holiday toppings and sauces for fries as well!

SERVE SPECIAL RECIPES - Earn Special Recipes from your customers, and serve them as the Daily Special in the Cheeseria! Each Special has a bonus you can earn for serving a prime example of that recipe. Master each special to earn a special prize!

SPECIAL DELIVERY - Some customers don't want to come all the way to Toastwood to grab some grilled cheese. When you start taking phone orders, customers can call to place their order, and you'll hire a Driver to help take and deliver orders to their homes instead!

name: SMB RMX Land
description: One Day In Sarasaland, Mario (Or Whoever You Are Playing As) is running through the desert and Encounters Thicc Boi Who Is Wielding The Phantom Ruby. The Hero Gets Teleported Away To Another Part Of The Desert And Meets A Wiggler Named Harold And A Snorpler Named Gerald. The Two Siblings Are Trying To Stop Thicc Boi From Destroying The Fabric Of Reality. The Hero And The Two Worm Brothers Set Out Two Stop Thicc Boi Before It Is Too Late...

name: Super Smash Bros. CMC+
description: CMC+ (stands for Character Making Community) is the biggest official modpack to date, including many, many character and stage mods both released here and exclusive to the modpack itself, as well as a myriad of perks and features that the other builds currently doesn't allow for (an all new Assist system, the ability to assign stages to characters for them to appear in in Classic Mode, alongside many more!).

name: Transylmania Deluxe
description:
Vampy is back with a remake of the classic Flash game! Relive your childhood and revisit the castle!
Transylmania Deluxe is a remake of Transylmania, a game once available on Zeeks and Funschool.

name: Ayrton Senna Racing
description:
A rom hack of Nigel Mansell World Championship released for SNES.

The entirety of the game is identical to the original game, featuring 16 tracks from the 1992 Formula One World Championship season except that all text has been translated to Brazilian Portuguese and all Nigel Mansell-related graphics have been replaced with Ayrton Senna's. The introduction/opening credits are also replaced with Ayrton Senna's career summary from lower-level motorsports up to his 1993 season with McLaren.

name: Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the Year Edition
description:
Ready to get swole? Swolemochao has a workout routine for you! But, it seems there's something odd about him, as if he's testing you more than training you. Find out the truth! Afterwards, find out what happened when Dr. Robotnik finds the fate of Swolemochao's mission. A depressed Player encounters Dr. Robotnik's newest scheme, the Mean Muscle Machine! Can you succeed with the perils that unfold?

Slapped together in a single package, Swolemochao 1 & 2: Gym of the Year Edition offers both games for you with remastered art and updated gameplay changes to improve upon the original 12 hour made first game, and extra bells and whistles for the not-made-in-12-hours sequel!

name: Luigi and the Quest for Nothing 2
description: After the events of Luigi and the Quest for Nothing, a mysterious figure snags the Nothing away from Luigi. I think he didn't like that. So off he went again to find this figure, along with his friend, the Green Toad. But little did both Luigi and this mysterious figure know of the importance of "The Nothing"... As you go through the worlds you will meet new unlikely allys, who will tell you about what exactly is happening in the world... or worlds... or universe?

name: Sonic Arena
description: Sonic Arena is a Fighting game that was finished after 17 years.

name: Monster World IV Regenesis
description: Monster World IV Regenesis is a fan-made role-playing game to celebrate the 35th anniversary of Wonder Boy. It features combat that expands on the original Monster World IV formula along with combat directly inspired by the popular ATB (Active Time Battle) system introduced in Final Fantasy IV, but with its own unique gimmicks.

name: Maggot Feast
description: Short 5 minute exploration game about collecting tools for your loved one.

name: Mario and Luigi: Superstar Simulator
description: Mario and Luigi: Superstar Simulator focuses on the battle elements of the Mario and Luigi series and enhances them with new enemies to fight and characters to play as. The playable characters range from the usual such as Mario, Luigi, and Bowser, but there are also some characters you wouldn't expect in this format such as Paper Mario, Sonic, or even Peppino from Pizza Tower. Each battle has something special and unique to bring to the table, like a new mechanic while dodging or a phase 2 that changes things up. There are some extra things to do as well, like playing minigames or going on bounty missions by collecting wanted posters in the overworld/HUB area.

name: Wario in Generic RPG: Chapter 2
description: Wario in Generic RPG follows Wario, as he is thrust into being the hero of an entire kingdom, trying to find pieces of an ancient artifact to save the kingdom from an unknown enemy. The game pokes fun at common RPG tropes, while also including a surprisingly deep story at its core. In the upcoming chapter 2, he meets an eccentric ringleader, who needs help reuniting his circus troupe to put on one, last show. Will you be the hero the kingdom needs?

name: Sonic LaserDisc
description: Sonic LaserDisc is a fangame that tributes to Sonic CD, focused on exploration and puzzles based on time travel.

name: Tails Adventure Remake
description: Tails Adventure Remake is a fan-made remake of the Game Gear game for modern platforms, adding 16:9 widescreen, high refresh rate support, improved physics, controls, and enemies' behavior.

name: Sonic Horizons
description: Sonic Horizons is an open-zone fangame inspired by Sonic Frontiers that aims to take the foundation of the open-zone formula that Frontiers established and expand on it in a different direction, focusing more on physics-based platforming/exploration, thinking outside the box, and generally forging your own path along the journey.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Gearhead
description: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Gearhead is the fourth episode of the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series,

name: Battle Cross Fever
description: Prepare yourself for this brand-new age of fighting game with never-before-seen mechanics!

name: Sonic Treading Power
description: Sonic Treading Power is a fan game made for SAGE 2023.

name: Éclipse The Cat
description: ​Éclipse The Cat is a semi-linear platform game that focuses on the variety of situations. Over the course of fast-paced levels, the player will unlock power-ups (running, dashing, flying, etc.) that will help them defeat the game's many bosses.​

name: Super Mario Bros. Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Spore 2D Creature Creator
description: This was a Flash game adaptation of the Spore Creature Creator

name: Techpack Collection
description: Techpack Collection is a remake of the 1980s-styled arcade game released in 2020 on Steam, Techpack. In this new version, you will find a whole brand-new menu, redone gameplay, and even more selectable arcade games! If you're a fan of old arcade games and the challenges they bring, this game may give you a kick!

name: Freedom Planet: Shang Mu Architect
description: Freedom Planet: Shang Mu Architect is an unofficial stage builder fan game set after the events of the first Freedom Planet, featuring its own campaign mode to showcase the capabilities of the editor.

name: Letter Jam
description: Letter Jam is a 2-6 player cooperative word game where players assist each other in composing meaningful words from letters around the table.

name: Flakboy 2
description: In this 3D stickman game you'll be a secret agent who manages to sneak into his enemies' base. Accomplish the missions and use your combat skills to get rid of the enemies with guns, sniper rifles, machine guns, mines, explosive barrels and much more. Flakboy is ready to test all kinds of experimental weapons.

name: DS Uranai Seikatsu
description:
DS Uranai Seikatsu (literally DS Divination Life) is a divination game for Nintendo DS, released in Japan as part of the Touch! Generations line in 2009
.
DS Uranai Seikatsu allows players to partake in multiple divination exercises and techniques, which include tarot readings, palmistry, the Four Pillars of Destiny, Zi Wei Dou Shu, horoscopes, Da Liu Ren and a daily fortune message.

name: Rushdown Rivals
description: Drive back evil robotic versions of several NG characters as your own NG icon. Stylishly dance through them as Cassette Girl, shoot them with Hank's personal arsenal, unleash Girlfriend's inner demon, and so much more in this tough-as-nails action game

name: Wilfred the Hero, Part 1
description: Game created for RPG Maker 2003 by Brandon Abley and Teo Mathlein with the initial objective of making a console-style RPG unlike any other created with the engine. Features 100% user-created content and no RPG Maker 2003-default game systems.

name: MicroSstep
description: "MicroSStep" is an exhilarating 2D action roguelite where you control "Cross", a dual-wielding girl who becomes infinitely stronger, and defeats monsters. Create the strongest swordsman by combining the items and skills you get each time you level up or clear a stage.

name: 100 Man-Yen Quiz Hunter
description:
"100 Man-Yen Quiz Hunter" (1 Million Yen Quiz Hunter) is a game based on a Japanese quiz show. The quiz show aired from 1981 to 1993 and was produced by TV Asahi.
This is a quiz show where viewers can participate, with 20 prizes being competed for, and the winner being determined by the total amount of prizes earned.

name: Experiment
description: You don't know where you are but you know you need to get out of there.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's
description:
Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food as far as the eye can see! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds! The robots' behavior has become somewhat unpredictable at night however, and it was much cheaper to hire you as a security guard than to find a repairman.

From your small office you must watch the security cameras carefully. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you're allowed to use per night (corporate budget cuts, you know). That means when you run out of power for the night- no more security doors and no more lights! If something isn't right- namely if Freddy bear or his friends aren't in their proper places, you must find them on the monitors and protect yourself if needed!

Can you survive five nights at Freddy's?

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 2
description:
Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!

In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!

What could go wrong?

As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.

As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 3
description:
Thirty years after Freddy Fazbear's Pizza closed it's doors, the events that took place there have become nothing more than a rumor and a childhood memory, but the owners of "Fazbear's Fright: The Horror Attraction" are determined to revive the legend and make the experience as authentic as possible for patrons, going to great lengths to find anything that might have survived decades of neglect and ruin.

At first there were only empty shells, a hand, a hook, an old paper-plate doll, but then a remarkable discovery was made...

The attraction now has one animatronic.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's 4
description:
This time, the terror has followed you home.

In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.

You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location
description:
Welcome to Circus Baby's Pizza World, where family fun and interactivity go beyond anything you've seen at those *other* pizza places! With cutting-edge animatronic entertainers that will knock your kids' socks off, as well as customized pizza catering, no party is complete without Circus Baby and the gang!

Now hiring: Late night technician. Must enjoy cramped spaces and be comfortable around active machinery. Not responsible for death or dismemberment.

Don't hold it against us.

name: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator
description: Presenting a fun Five Nights at Freddy's adventure with a lighter touch for the holidays, Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator puts you in charge of developing your own restaurant! Design pizzas, feed kids, and get high scores!

name: Ultimate Custom Night
description:
Welcome to the ultimate FNAF mashup, where you will once again be trapped alone in an office fending off killer animatronics! Featuring 50 selectable animatronic characters spanning seven Five Nights at Freddy's games, the options for customization are nearly endless. Mix and match any assortment of characters that you like, set their difficulty from 0-20, then jump right into the action! From your office desk, you will need to manage two side doors, two vents, as well as two air hoses, all of which lead directly into your office.

This time you will have to master other tools as well if you want to complete the ultimate challenges, tools such as the heater, A/C, a global music box, a power generator, and more. As if all of that weren't enough, you'll also need to set up laser traps in the vents, collect Faz-Coins, purchase items from the prize counter, and as always, keep a close eye on not one, but two, Pirate Cove curtains!

name: Kitsunetsuki Project
description: Multiplayer-focused arena third-person shooter (TPS) game in anime style

name: Snakes LTD
description: Casual Snakes Combat. Kill other snakes and grow as much as you can.

name: Beat 'Em All
description: Beat 'Em All is a very crazy, fast, and weird platformer in which you need to beat everyone in your way!

name: Esper Girls
description: Esper Girls is a 2D action platformer game inspired by the many Japanese retro, actiony, and arcadey types of games that populated consoles like the Sega Genesis and Playstation, and a little bit of GBA as well.

name: Tacti-Cat
description: Tacti-Cat is a fast paced, momentum based, platformer where you play as Ellie the cat and use fish guns to save the world from an evil wizard invasion!

name: Fuu3's Fuun Journey
description: Fuu3's Fuun Journey is a 2D platformer that stars the titular Fuu3 on an adventure he’s clearly not ready for, but he’s gonna do it. Someone has to! Joined with his friends Fuu6 and Fuu9, he must make his way through weird and unknown locations in order to stop the nefarious Minus3 and his dastardly team from finding and controlling the remaining paloomanium, an element thought to grant the user powers beyond reality. Will you have the upper hand? Or will you fail and suffer under the might of Minus3? Only one way to find out: BE THERE OR BE SQUARE!

name: Welcome to the Game 2+
description: Welcome to the Game 2+ is a mod for Welcome to the Game 2 that adds a ton of new websites, new enemies, new items, new modes, twitch integration and more.

name: Fix the Lab!
description: Lucas, a newly hired young scientist's assistant, accidentally turns the lab into chaos! Now he must retrieve the gears to fix the machines before his boss returns.

name: Nicolás the Sea Urchin
description:
One day, Nicolás was hungry, so he decides to make a seaweed burger, but something he didn't know is that the burger was the most perfect burger that was ever cooked.
Suddenly, Loquendumbo breaks into his house and steals the burger! Don't let that bastard easily get away with your burger, control Nicolás and travel through the inmense and amazing underwater world!

name: Galactic Blasters D2: Brilliant Supernova
description: Galactic Blasters D2 - Brilliant Supernova is the fifth entry in the horizontal space shooter game series Galactic Blasters.

name: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest
description: Veredilia: The Sacred Forest is a 2D platforming game that takes inspiration from classic platformers such as Sonic, and fighting games like Mortal Kombat. The game aims to be a combination of classic 2D platforming with 1v1 fighting whilst also exploring the large forest of Veredilia across various locales with a wide range of characters, technical movesets, and flashy combos. You can take control of one of 3 characters, each with their own special moves, combos, and super moves. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and kick, punch, and slash your way to victory, before it's too late. Do you have what it takes?

name: Geno 2 the Generals' Orders
description: Take out demonic generals that have taken over the planet! Destroy giga robots, save the cities, give the citizens their homes back, and stop the reign of terror from the 6 masterminds. Collect power orbs to unlock new areas and explore the open world of each location.

name: Terry's Treasure Trouble!
description:
Terry T. Cat is back, and he's going to hop-and-bop and cartwheel his way through the Feyside Islands in search of a mysterious lost treasure!
After finding a treasure map on the beach, our old cartoon cat Terry decides to go off to a land of adventure. However, a gang of pirates, led by the notorious Grand Beard, are also in pursuit of this legendary treasure, and will stop at nothing to get it.
Along the way, Terry will find Star Fairies willing to take a hit for him, ladders and bars to hang on to, bouncy springs, ridable vehicles, Mode 7 Special Stages, and minigames. Oh, and coins. Lots and lots of coins.

name: The Wind's Disciple
description: It's a parody of the famous MOBA game League of Legends. The Wind's Disciple is a visual novel with a tiny bit of open world details.

name: Charade Maniacs: Limited Edition
description:
Limited edition of Charade Maniacs. Comes with:
- Charade Maniacs game
- Award Booklet
= Drama CD "Find the Memories!"

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Shang Tsung
description:
Play as the powerful sorcerer Shang Tsung.

included as a pre-order bonus for the game and available 5 days early with the Premium or Kollector's Edition of the game.

name: Beasts of Horror
description:
One of the first Israeli action games!

Beasts of Horror you play as a warrior from millions of years in the past. Your people have recently left the caves and started a village. However, your wife returned to the caves to gather the rest of her belongings and has not returned. Now you must take up arms against fire-breathing dragons, deadly wasps, and other strange creatures to rescue your wife.

Once thought lost, this game was eventually rediscovered by the Israeli Game Conservation Movement.

name: Russian Roulette
description:
Russian Roulette is a 3D action game, and the first game published by Buka, formerly only a distributor in Russia.

A ring of planets, connected by galactic portals has become lost in space. The planets are devastated and the portals have been disassembled. It is up to you to you to find the missing parts of the portals so they can be reactivated.

You can exit and enter any vehicle you encounter at will, and many have turrets that can rotate independently. In some levels you will be accompanied by an NPC who will guide you to the next portal part.

name: Russian Roulette II: The Next Worlds
description:
Russian Roulette II: The Next Worlds is a 3D shooter and sequel to Russian Roulette.

In the game you have to, again, unite six planets through the activation of galactic portals. Each of the planets features a completely different theme, ranging from prehistoric, to medieval and futuristic.

You can move around the worlds freely, both on foot or using the various vehicles available to you, including tanks, jeeps, space ships, or even live dragons or giant grasshoppers.

name: Road Wars
description: Self billed as the "most realistic combat racing sim ever created", Road Wars is a driving and shooting game where twelve different characters race their armed and armored vehicles across a dozen assorted tracks. Although the emphasis is on racing and completing laps, cars are equipped with a variety of weapons to impede the progress of the other drivers including gatling guns, missiles, oil slicks, and land mines. Individual drivers also have personal advantages such as cheaper repairs or better traction. Players can compete in single races or three different league circuits of increasing difficulty. Each league season consists of eight races where drivers use their cash winnings for repairs and upgrades between the stages.

name: Click For Cash: Cashed Out
description:
it's time to click till you're filthy rich... again!

Welcome to Click For Cash: Cashed Out, the best idle clicker game about yellow buttons since the original Click For Cash! This sequel is filled to the brim with new features, customization, and polish. In this game you click a button for cash (real original, I know), purchase a variety of upgrades to get more money, and unlock achievements to become the richest person in the universe! at least in the game...

name: Rasen Reijoh Spiral Ojosama: Chohatsu no Makina
description: A "vertical roll, horizontal scroll" action game where you take control of Lady Makina, a young girl with martial arts and drill hair grappling powers, on a mission to rescue her father from haywire robots in a research facility.

name: Moorhuhn: The first 10 Years
description: Moorhuhn: Die ersten 10 Jahre is a Action game bundle developed by ak tronic Software & Services GmbH and published by phenomedia publishing gmbh in 2009.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Jean-Claude Van Damme Skin
description: A playable skin for Johnny Cage, inspired by the legendary martial artist Jean-Claude Van Damme.

name: Soupsoup
description:
Interactive illustration magazine of Hotcornsoup, Soupsoup Magazine!

Each games in the magazine are simple and casual, through collaboration, they provide experiences to fall into the world created by the imagination of various illustrators.
Also, attractive new illustrators participate in each update to continue to create unique experiences.

name: Pocket Plants
description:
Magical evolution game with a healthy twist.
Merge your plants to unlock dozens of cute new ones as you revitalize several different worlds. Charming characters will aid you in your adventure by giving you different tasks to complete for great rewards. You can even connect your phone or Fitbit to help generate more energy as you exercise!

name: Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Versus 2 Cross Boost
description: Sin descripción

name: Wrecked: A Psychedelic Adventure
description:
Wrecked is an edutainment game developed by KKOS and was apparently published by Healthwise. It is meant to educate players about the uses and misuses of drugs.

You play as Jo, who travels through strange and surreal worlds, collecting both points and drugs. Each drug found has a different effect: some merely distort the screen, but others have useful effects, such as shrinking Jo down so he can fit through small gaps.

While reviews for both an Amiga and DOS version of the game were published, it is unknown if the game saw a proper release and only a shareware demo of the DOS version has been found.

name: Porterminus
description:
Porterminus is a spooky RPG.

It follows the story of a girl named Julie, her boyfriend Donnie, and a mysterious cat.

Warning: Although the graphics are all pixel art, it has rather intense body horror, please keep that in mind before deciding to play.

name: KilaFlow
description: Play as the mascot of a blazing fast (for it's time) antivirus software to clear out corruptions and viruses from various devices around a town.

name: Manufactur'inc.
description: Lead your new company to success in this industry management game. Blueprint and optimize your production; make ethical choices to influence your worker conditions, ecological impact, automation level, and more. Will you create a simple manuFactory or a beneFactory?

name: Rockman EXE Phantom of Network
description: Rockman EXE Phantom of Network is a video game in the Mega Man Battle Network series for mobile phones developed by Capcom. The game was only released and made available in Japan. It is most well known for featuring five original characters that did not appear in any other video games: the magician Mr. Hat with his NetNavi HatMan and son Shuichi Ubochi as well as the NetNavis JammingMan and Cache. All of these characters, however, appeared in the Rockman EXE anime series. The game was followed by a Japan-exclusive sequel for mobile phones entitled Rockman EXE Legend of Network.

name: Nuclear Cheetah
description:
Bounce, pounce, and slide your way through fast-paced levels as Chaz, the radioactive cheetah! This retro platformer inspired by the likes of Sonic the Hedgehog and Jazz Jackrabbit features a high skill ceiling, crispy pixel art, and a bangin’ MIDI-styled soundtrack.

Nuclear Cheetah combines time attack platforming with a collect-a-thon progression system. Play through and master challenging stages, earn power orbs to unlock new areas of the castle, and save the princess; all while uncovering the story of how a once mild-mannered cheetah transformed into a green gangsta who eats toxic waste for breakfast.

name: Rockman EXE Legend of Network
description: Rockman EXE Legend of Network is a video game in the Mega Man Battle Network series for mobile phones developed by Capcom. The game was only released and made available in Japan. It was preceded by Rockman EXE Phantom of Network. The game introduces a new character named Cerise, a Netopian.

name: Refind Self: The Personality Test Game
description:
All players approach games in varied ways, making different choices.

No one ever plays in exactly the same way. Indeed, how a person plays can be an indicator of their personality...

And Refind Self is a game where you can learn all about that personality.

name: Journey Record
description: At a glance, this game looks like a retro 2D RPG game, but this is actually an action RPG, where you use the Magic Eye Camera and Crystals to swap between seeing the world in 2D or 3D and progress through puzzle-like stages as you fight your way across the land.

name: The Detective Reaper Invites
description:
Invitation from the Detective Grim Reaper is a roguelite deduction game.
As the detective grim reaper, your job is to solve randomly generated murder cases, find the culprit, and execute them.

name: Outer Outage
description:
UH OH!! A little alien named Blemie got his ship stolen by the EVIL robot Retri whilst on vacation to the Planet Cluster! What will he do now!? Well he's gotta find the Outages, creatures that possess insane electrical energy and can take out the high tech security measures Retri has set up.

So now... jump, dash, drop and LAUNCH through all of Planet Cluster for these Outages! Game contains 13 whole open sandbox collectathon stages, 8 bossfights (3 mini bosses too) and fast paced, adrenaline pumping collectathon gameplay! All tied together with a vibrant, mixed media art style and a 2.5D, surreal aesthetic.

name: Super Jack
description: Sin descripción

1939 is a 2D turn-based strategy game with elements of the strategy board games, similar to the Panzer General series. It represents all the major battles of the September Campaign against Poland, referring directly to historical events that launched World War II. The game contains 7 historical and 5 fictional scenarios. The army units are represented by tanks, motorcycles, infantry, cavalry, artillery, reconnaissance aircraft and bombers. The game features numerous historical pictures and allows up to two players to play and choose the Polish or German side.

name: Star Cruiser
description:
Star Cruiser is a space shooter/adventure game with many distinct elements from a number of different genres. It focuses on exploration and is very story-driven, as the game takes the players through various star systems and planets to solve the mystery of the VOID attacks. On their way, the players will meet many peculiar characters, learn their stories and try to help with their problems whenever an opportunity presents itself.

Additionally, this port is somewhat more ‘mature’ if such a term could be used, due to its sense of humor and the depiction of alcohol. This version of the game is quite different from the Mega Drive port that is already available in English, but it’s similar to the original PC-88 release as far the mechanics are concerned (except for the character portraits and some other minor details). An interesting aspect of the game are the shops, which were not present in the MD port. There, just the equipment can be found, as the entire money system was scrapped. In the PC versions the players would get money for the missions instead, which in turn would allow them to buy better gear and additional resources.

The main story beats are the same, but there are many differences as far as the characters and events go, which gives this version its own identity. In fact, this is what makes the game quite different from the MD port in particular. For example, the final area in this version is massive, whereas in the MD port it was much smaller. What is more, some major characters have different roles in this version of the game, and some others only appear in the MD port.

name: Hugo Gold
description: Hugo Gold is a compilation video game developed and published by ITE Media in 1998. It is a collection of 12 minigames from the classic Hugo games, including a special version of Labyrinth from Skærmtrolden Hugo.

name: Wipeout
description: In this trivia game, a screen of sixteen possible answers (to a question such as "Which of these inventions were discovered by accident?") are shown - eleven are correct, the first awarding $10, then $20, etc. up to $110 for the last answer. The other five answers are incorrect, and hitting a "Wipeout" loses all your money from the whole game (ouch). The two contestants with the most money at the end of round 1 go to play in the Wipeout Auction. From 12 options, players bid on how many correct answers they can pick out (up to the maximum of 8). Hitting a wipeout allows your opponent to steal the frame if they can find just one correct answer. Winning two frames gets you through to the final.

name: Akazukin Cha Cha Cha
description: Akazukin ChaChaCha is a Sharp X68000 game based after the anime. The game plays like a shoot-em-up

name: Music Intro Pro 68K
description: This is a fun little quiz game where you a hear the first seconds of game tunes and guess which game it is.

name: Mad News
description: Mad News is a German business simulation. You are chief editor of a tabloid newspaper. With spectacular stories you try to increase your paper's circulation (and your account balance). You also can earn money with adverts in your paper. Two other papers are in competition with you.

name: Deluxe Trivial Pursuit
description: Deluxe Trivial Pursuit is an improved new version of Trivial Pursuit, featuring among others 3,000 new questions, VGA 256-color graphics, music and sound effects, and a fully animated quizmaster.

name: K.S.-n-Kickin
description:
K.S.-n-Kickin is a 3D action puzzle video game made by Artworld UK and Big Future Ltd. for Kinder Surprise, with music licensed from Telstar Records. It was released for Microsoft Windows. The game was a promotion by Ferrero to "strengthen their foothold in the younger age group market". The game features Kinder Surprise toys from the K00 series.

The game was not sold in stores, but was offered in exchange for Kinder Egg wrappers which were sent to Ferrero. The promotion was advertised via TV commercials. K.S.-n-Kickin has the same map layout and soundtrack as Gubble 2 (part of the Gubble video game series), but has different backgrounds, characters, and items.

name: Trudy's Time and Place House
description: Trudy's Time and Place House (aka Lisa: La maison du temps et de l'espace) is a video game published in 1995 on Windows by Edmark Corporation. It's an educational game, set in a math / logic and pre-school / toddler themes, and was also released on Windows 3.x.

name: Left.
description: Sin descripción

name: Haunted?
description: Meet 8 different ghosts and learn about their lives. Maybe you can help them?

name: Lowtide
description: A flatgame about the tide pools I went to as a kid from a new perspective.

name: Rise of a Hero
description: Clear the areas captured by terrorists in Syria from terrorists and rescue the hostages.

name: Pokémon Ancestral X
description: Ancestral X is a difficulty hack of Pokémon X, built primarily for Nuzlocking, and otherwise inspired by popular hacks from Drayano, Buffel, and NotSuicuu. This is intended to be a truly challenging experience, but you’ll also find features common to enhancement hacks throughout. All 721 Pokémon are available, the leveling curve has been revamped, quality of life improvements are in place, and trainer battles are custom built and significantly harder. Best of all, Ancestral X introduces a number of features never before seen in Gen 6 hacks, including the ORAS Megas, Mobile PC, Trainer Natures, and Custom AI!

name: Pokemon Black 2: DE
description: Pokemon Black 2: DE offers an authentic Unova experience with a region almost exclusively filled with double-battles, a "challenging-but-not-kaizo" difficulty level, balance changes to improve viability and variety, postgame and all-new content within the main adventure, and a bunch of quality-of-life improvements!

name: Pokemon Sour Crystal
description:
This 'improvement hack' of Pokemon Crystal has been 5 years in the making.
It was created with the mindset of updating Crystal to 'current-gen' standards but without losing the nostalgic feel of the original.

The hack has many features that may make playing it more comfortable for newer players such as the "PPS" system (pokeride).

name: Amalgamation
description: 5 speedmapped short maps inspired by wads like Autophagy, Speed of Doom, Surge, Claustrophobia 1024 etc.

name: It's Real And It Kills
description: 9 old school vanilla maps featuring Castlevania music and Realm667 textures.

name: Intrusion
description: Doomguy invades a techbase full of demons. This is my first map that uses custom textures, and used Essel's amazing pack.

name: Ruined District
description: Ruined District is a short city map for RAMP 2023 back in June, now revised and playing/looking a bit better than its first version. Adding traps to some areas and making the map just a tad harder overall.

name: Him
description:
In the music galaxy, a prince awaits an attack from outsiders.

Thousands of spaceships entered the galaxy to mine what does not belong to them! Him is a third person casual game where the player runs and jump between home planets to destroy the invading space pirates and their spaceships under a limited time before they mine the lands.

You will have the option to choose between different instruments. Each instrument represent a different shooting style for the player. Choose carefully which shooting style you want to play with based on what goals you want to accomplish.
